I review it after 51 minutes and I don't think I'm gonna watch it until the end. It's a very stupid low budget movie.

reviews.review_title: A film that has no idea what it is
reviews.content: Don't expect what you'd expect, because you'll be disappointed. Is it a superhero story? No, is it a comedy? No, does it have emotional depth? No, does it have a female empowerment driven storyline? No, does the name have any meaning? No, does it make sense? No. It's a rushed mess, with bad acting, forced comedy that even Melissa can't save, and a storyline timeline that moves too fast for a movie. Terrible.

When I read that Ben Falcone wrote, directed and starred in this movie, I thought, oh boy- here we go again. To be honest, this may be his best flick and it certainly helped that Octavia Spencer was in it, I mean some star power always helps to draw in the fans. I'm predicting a sequel which was obvious. The movie wasn't so terrible and I kind of enjoyed it. However I think Melissa is super talented and she is overdue a good script. Perhaps it was a slow day for Octavia and why not have a bit of fun and get paid for doing it. This was not the worst Netflix movie.

I'll admit, I went in expecting a terrible script that some drunk Netflix executive green lit, banking solely on McCarthy's comedic fame to get viewers. The first ten or so minutes seemed to prove me wrong: the child McCarthy and Spencer's friendship was cute, and I even give the writers props for avoiding the whole "bully turned into smart kid's friend" trope. Then they quickly age up the characters (which, okay, I didn't sign up for a teenage story anyway) and they become estranged (fine, I've fought over much stupider stuff with my friends), all with very little humour, and none of it stupid. Was the film targeted wrong? Is this a semi serious superhero movie, and not a comedy with a superhero veneer?When McCarthy herself finally shows up, the film initially keeps the half serious tone, and paints a fairly depressing picture of a world where supervillains (albeit petty ones) exist without superheroes to fight them. They kept showing small acts of kindness on McCarthy's part, which all supported the idea she would make a great hero (a-la Steve Rogers being a hero even without his powers). I even appreciated McCarthy's nonsensical dialogue with Kevin Dunn's character, taking for granted that it wasn't supposed to be "ha ha" funny, and sounded like rambling in universe as well.Maybe I shouldn't have. Maybe that was supposed to be a laugh out loud bit, that simple did not land. Because from the reunion onwards, the film decides it clearly does not care about the tone it was setting, and becomes just another terrible script that some drunk Netflix executive green lit, banking solely on McCarthy's comedic fame. It just took some time to pretend it wasn't.What follows is just another superhero spoof, with a little heart here and there (I'll admit McCarthy was sweet as Taylor Mosby's sort of aunt), but otherwise nothing to say. It feels more like a collection of unrelated SNL skits, held together by spit and the pure comedic power of raw chicken eating. The villains are goofy, and not in a good way, the plot is as predictable as they come, the "twists" are as predictable as the plot, and overall it looks like Ben Falcone wrote half a script and then didn't bother to re-read it.Which is a shame, because the first ten minutes felt like this could be a solid superhero spoof, if maybe not a serious superhero movie. In the end, I got what I initially expected, but I still managed to be disappointed.

reviews.review_title: How you doin? Not so bad and yourself? Can't complain.

Personally, I think Mel peaked with the movie SPY and it's all been not quite as funny since.

reviews.review_title: Another Spy Kids movie nobody asked for
reviews.content:
I was actually excited to see a superhero movie starring Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer, both of whom I love, and hoped to see a different type of hero for once. The story could have been interesting, showing a different point of view by mature adult women, who have zero interest in proving anything to anybody anymore, or just realizing their true power, something... But this just looks like a vanity project, or friends
making a "fun" movie to spend time with eachother, what a waste of CGI, if a movie has no good writing and relies on "fart jokes". Octavia Spencer just looks checked out for the entire movie, which is such a shame since she actually is a brilliant actress. There is so much missing here, and I really wanted to like this. Another popcorn movie, but feel free to cook dinner while having this in the background.

The first hour isn't the worst. I had to shut off McCarthy's last move - super genius? - 10 minutes in because it was intolerable, but I did giggle out loud a bit at this one. It's been a long time since she made me laugh. Watch this for the 1980s crab dance. Then feel free to shut it off. It was weird, but weird in a way that if it were a cartoon, like Futurama or The Simpsons (first 10 seasons) you'd laugh. Pretend it's a cartoon.

reviews.content: I love Melissa McCarthy, but the story of this movie was really bad. After watching the trailer I had high expectations for this movie and it wasn't at all like I expected.

reviews.review_title: It is forgettable - but kinda sweet.
reviews.content: I can understand, why so many people are underwhelmed by the movie. On the other side I think, it is a kinda fresh breeze, to have people with powers, which are not "perfect".The movie let me smile mildly - yes - not every joke was a bullseye hit. However I have to say I kind of enjoyed the innocence and sweetness of the movie.After the so anticipated Jack Snyder's Justice League directors cut, which I found strangely unsatisfying, Thunder Force is simple. It is kinda yummy hot dog, when other superhero movies are lobsters, which are often overcooked, or just simply screwed up.I have to say - it is not a movie theater film - and I would have been upset, to spend hard earned cash on a story like that. But it is indefinitely better than a lot of other digital movies which came out.

But if you're looking for an entertaining and funny movie for the family, you're set.Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer are both entertaining and Jason Bateman is fantastic as always.While the whole movie has a fun, campy feel there are a few times where it goes a little overboard but overall it's fun, funny and entertaining.

reviews.review_title: Funny Movie made for family I think

reviews.review_title: It's not because of female leads, stop saying it is
reviews.content: It's because the movie SUCKS and is probably the most incoherent nonsensical garbage that has come out this year. If it's because of female leads then why do we like movies like such as: Halloween, Friday the 13th, A Nightmare on Elm Street, Terminator (1 and 2), etc. You see the difference? Yes they have female leads but the movies I mentioned are GOOD, this pathetic cashgrab is AWFUL.
Dreadful movie, I wish I could sue for the time back.

I have followed Melissa's career with interest and found several of her films wildly entertaining, especially Spy. However, this concoction is so very, very disappointing. Firstly the jokes are stretched out way beyond their humour and the chemistry is totally missing between Melissa and Octavia's characters. It's as if she signed up to the film, before reading the script ('cause it had Melissa in it of course, why wouldn't you!?) and later regretted the decision, but it was too late to say no.This could have been so much better, the acting, jokes, direction and so on. The only person (character) who I felt close to genuine was the actress playing the daughter of Octavia's character. She did a fine job in duff circumstances.Only watch if you have nothing better to do. Melissa, you are so much better than this!

reviews.review_title: If you didn't get the humor it was not meant for you
reviews.content: I loved the idea. The whole concept was fun. Two friends. Opposites. Who, no matter what, care for each other, and in a way complete something inside each other. I know Melissa's humor often goes over the top but I think in this film it was well balanced. And Octavia is typically a serious actress, I thought she did well to bring the film a slightly milder tone. It was full of geek Easter Eggs, one of which was a You Killed Kenny line that made my sides hurt.If you didn't get the humor or the story it was simply not meant for you. I enjoyed this film immensely. If this movie had been done with younger thinner actresses I believe the rating would have been higher. But I am so glad that it was done with these two beautiful and real looking ladies.I know they may not make another but I wish they would. I wish that it would have been better received.

I get the idea of Superheroes can come in all shapes and sizes but this one is hyperbolically zany.Plot is lenient and not many moments to remember.Soundtracks are something which is worth looking into other than that it is a bum action, cheesy adventure, overacted comedy.Good thing it's a family movie but at the same time it becomes a parody as well.

reviews.review_title: Don't like Ben/Melissa movies? Don't watch
reviews.content: First of all I understand that this generation isn't happy unless they're complaining about something but if I may critique movie reviews for a second " worst movie ever" and "absolute trash" is not a review of the movie. Granted I know this generation also can't stand to write or read anything longer than a Tweet I still think you can take the time to say what you did not like about the film. The movie is cheesy but I found it to be almost a parody of the superhero genre mixed with the usual corky style of Ben Falcone and Melissa McCarthy. So many reviews are saying how much his movies suck and how unfunny Melissa is which begs the question why are you watching the movie? I. E I can't stand Tracy Morgan and I'm not going to subject myself to a movie with him in it. Reminds me of all the people that complain about Kristen Stewart and Amy Schumer's acting yet choose to watch their films anyway. I digress. I do agree with most people saying that the first part of the film when they're growing up together is better. Having said that unfortunately I think the worst part of this film is Octavia Spencer. She's a fine actress but has never really had a leading role in a comedy before and she's not very good at comedy. Much like in the movie Like a boss the chemistry is weak and one of the actresses had to carry the film. Then it was Tiffany Haddish and in this film it is Melissa carrying the movie. I think bigger energy was required for Octavia Spencer's part and ironically enough I think Tiffany Haddish would've been a good cast. Not to mention it would've been funny to see her play a smart nerd. A certain sense of humor is required for the crab/man character that Jason Bateman plays and I guess I have that sense of humor. I thought the scenes with him in it were so over-the-top they were funny much like how a dog can be so ugly it's cute. I actually think there should have been more animal/people hybrids in the movie to make his character more legit. I don't think it's their best movie but it was still entertaining and consistent with their other work. Kind of just feels like once something is popular to hate then everyone hates it. It's nice to read reviews but watch it and make up your own mind.

According to Wikipedia, The New York Times ranked Melissa McCarthy #22 in its list of the 25 Greatest Actors of the 21st Century - citation required. That just goes to prove that either a) Wikipedia is a highly unreliable source of credible information or b) The New York Times has an incredible sense of humour.I have sat in AA meetings funnier than this pile of flaming garbage however it does give me hope that I too will find an investor to finance me filming my bowel movements, which is literally what this movie is. This is the type of movie to make William Friese-Greene wish he'd taken up woodwork instead of inventing motion picture.
I loved this movie. These two bounce off each other really well and I laughed all the way through.Thoroughly enjoyable film.

I wanted to like it because Melissa Mcarthy and Octavia Spencer, but it's terrible! I sat through the whole film because my partner wanted to watch it, turns out we were both thinking the same and were left wondering how we got to the end of it without one of us saying it was bad and switching it off! I don't recall a single laugh from either of us!Octavia Spencer is a great actress but I felt like even she knew the movie was terrible, she looked like she couldn't be bothered through most of it. Save yourself a couple of hours and don't watch this!

reviews.review_title: Watch it for what it is
reviews.content: This isn't meant to be a high brow tour de force that's going to change peoples lives or win awards. It's really dumb, but so dumb it becomes funny. Don't go in expecting more than that and it's kinda entertaining.

reviews.review_title: Started well, fell flat, had a few laughs
reviews.content: It had some potential in the beginning but the direction of the actors made most of the movie flat and uninteresting, which is great if you wanna "watch" a movie while playing a casual game on your phone.Thinking back, most of my laughs, if not all of them had Jason Bateman in them, who seems to just do his thing with what he got, making the scenes where he's a main part, or just supporting, enjoyable.If you just wanna turn off your brain and relax with your favorite handheld game, but also want to half-watch a movie, I would recommend this one. But if you want to be fully entertained by a movie... Skip this one.

People are being so harsh with this one. It's a MM movie! You should kind of expect what to see going into watching it if you have seen any of her other movies. If you don't like those, you probably won't like this, but if you do, you will love it! It's really cute, super cheesy, but cute.

Spencer's acting was lackluster. It's a Falcone/McCarthy movie so I went into it with the bar low. There were a few funny lines but overall it sucked. And for the reviewer saying the negative critics are male, not true sweetie. 100% grade A female and I think it sucked.

reviews.review_title: Sometimes Mellissa McCarthy do not means a good comedy
reviews.content: I loved her movie when she was an secret agent along with Statham & Law. It was really funny movie, that if I find it on one of TV channel I will stay to watch it for another time. But this one is.. no way.. strange scenario, not explained history of miscreants, it was really hard for me to go through the entire movie. Not recommended.
The funniest movie. Also the whole cast, except the villain, are plus size. Nice touch.

Everyone knows the McCarthy comedy....so why look at this movie....i dont love this movie but i liked it for my grandkids....i gave it a ten to boost up the ratio....it is a solid 6.....on an off day i love looking at this movie and tripping....so go easy on my girl yall.

Thunder Force deserves one star at the most, but there are some genuine laugh out loud moments with Mellissa Macarthy in her typical deadpan manner. What Jason Bateman is doing in this film, I really couldn't work out. Overall the plot and dialogue is dreadful, the concept childish but they've thrown money at the production purely due to the cast. So bad it actually has some appeal, but only so much as to give it one extra star than single it deserves.
Really good movie. Funny and quite entertaining. If you want a movie that takes your mind off the problems of the world, have a laugh and root for female superheroes This is a movie for you.

I can see what this movie is attempting to do, however it doesn't hit the spot. It's neither satire enough to be a spoof nor serious enough to pass as an action movie. For that reason it simply sits in the middle and drags with the occasional funny line. Had they pushed it further on the spoof side, it could have been fantastic. Poor writing was the death of this movie.

I and my 17 year old son both really enjoyed this movie so all you people rating it lower than 5 need to lighten up already!First we should all be thankful we're able to watch newer movies considering the pandemic how everyone works around it.Then we found it funny and watchable.A few parts could have been a little better but overall it was still good entertainment!

Don't know why Netflix keeps green lighting these god awful stinker series and would actually make something good for a change. Imagine all the original and creative ideas the were pushed aside to make "thunder force" Netflix this and cowboy bebop were the final straws.

reviews.review_title: I didn't last until the end...
reviews.content: I was going to write in-depth review but this film is so pathetic it doesn't even deserve that. McCarthy is just not funny.
...but didn't love the movie. Asinine story and not much considering it's a superhero movie. Waste of a lot of great talent!

reviews.review_title: A raucous laugh out loud riot
reviews.content: This brilliant, silly, slapstick homage to 80s spoofs, e.g. Airplane, made me laugh until I hurt, mostly because I had abdominal surgery a few weeks ago, and laugh some more. Melissa McCarthy does some heavy lifting and gets plenty of support from the all star cast. After Covid lockdown over binging on superhero epics, this was just the pallet cleanser I was hoping for.

Ditto to everything already said about this abysmal film. I love Melissa and I love Ben...when he's acting. But if a director makes stellar Octavia Spencer look like a wooden walk-on then something is amiss. And it happens in every movie he directs. He's great...just not at directing. Give it up Ben.This was without doubt one of the worst movies I've ever seen. Well conceived, but badly written, badly acted, badly directed, bad bad bad bad bad.I'm surprised that he's continually willing to put his and Melissa's reputations up against all his failures. Tammy, The Boss, Life of the Party. All have the exact same ratings and criticisms....the script and the director.Please Ben... we love you. You're a funny actor. Don't feel overshadowed by your wife. Play along and do what you do best. And please release Melissa from her obligation to support your dreams.

reviews.review_title: Grand film but clearly social media must think its uncool
reviews.content: Grand film, not the best ever seen but entertaining enough to stay watching...and a hell of a lot better than alot of the other nonsense released in the last year or two. Cant see why its getting such a slating here....i assume it mustve got negative press on social media and as our new generation cant think for themselves, they must hate the film too as a result....
I watched this not even halfway, and I must say that this movie is total carbage, why movies like these are made? Main character tries to be funny, but she is not. Bad story, bad actors, avoid this.
Typical Melissa McCarthy and husband movie. If she is in, he is in it! I couldn't make myself watch to the end.

reviews.review_title: A movie that was painful to watch.
reviews.content: I like Melissa, but that was her worst presentation. Octavia went through the movie like a zombie.

Stop all the hate.... No it's not a typical superhero movie... But I laughed out loud at the many parts... Pretty much every scene with Jason Bateman and Melissa Mccarthy was just hilarious....Jason Bateman side crab walking in the big fight scene... Omg I died.Give it a try, it's very 80's dumb funny... And I loved it.

It's no secret that Melissa McCarthy and Olivia Spencer are great actresses. I hope their. I can't understand why they keep accepting roles like this. This was just disrespectful for what they can do.

reviews.review_title: Absolute crap... If u have time unlimited time watch it else don't bother..
reviews.content:
Absolute crap... If u have time unlimited time watch it else don't bother.. Terrible plot
Mccarthy was OK rest is blaaaa
Rest is absurd
Total nuts.

reviews.review_title: Perfect in its carefree, comedic, superhero genre.
reviews.content: I really liked the set up and the story premises. I love these actresses so much, and they made me laugh. I am just happy watching any movie with Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer. I only didn't really understand crab man..
What a load of crap. The actors must be embarrassed to have made this movie. Not even suitable for kids as they would probably find it boring. Nuffield said.

reviews.review_title: Only Value is Jason Bateman's Scenes.
reviews.content: I have at least somewhat enjoyed all of Mellissa's other movies even though some have been rather lacking in quality and comedy. However, this one was very low quality. The only decent scenes were the ones with Jason Bateman and they were only of Skit Show quality, not movie quality. Even Melissa had not much for any funny moments in the movie outside of the Bateman scenes. The worst acting and most uncomfortable moments were from Oliva's acting which was incredible slow, awkward and out of place. She sounded, acted, and moved like a slow elderly person. We are supposed to believe that she is super smart yet she talks like she is mentally slow and 1/2 out of it. I am guessing that might have been intended due to the intended comedy of things being ridiculous like Bateman being a crab man. One of the worst parts of the movie is that it doesn't keep a persistent tone or atmosphere and jumps all over the place. Also horrible is the random drawn out boring jokes that is the type of stuff normally cut from movies and maybe seen in deleted scenes or outtakes.Overall somewhat disappointed although I was not expecting much from what I saw in the previews.
One the worst movies I have seen in a while. Absolute disaster.

reviews.review_title: The worst Movie of McCharty ever had.
reviews.content: A Mickey Worst Movie. I'd rather watch Mike & Molly TV SERIES.
What were all of you thinking? This movie is a waste of time.
This movie does not deserve it's low score and bad reviews. It is funny and the actors are great.
I didn't go in expecting brilliance. Lots of good one-liners. Melissa and Octavia work well together. Some awkward moments too, but light fare and plenty of laughs on a rainy day.

reviews.review_title: Just because you can DOESN'T mean you should!
reviews.content: We're there a few cute parts? Sure. Could have done so much more with the premise. Another letdown...
I registered an account only in order to be able to review this movie. What the hell. Awful story, not even one funny moment. A cringefest.
Old recycled jokes you can anticipate every time. Phoned in performances with no comedic timing.

reviews.review_title: You know what, it's funny get over yourselves.
reviews.content: Very funny. If you're looking for a moving heartfelt powerful film. Don't watch something called Thunderforce!If you want a laugh watch this film. It's great.
This movie straight Garbage...Like OMG Y'all do not watch.

Take it for what it is, a fun family movie. My twelve year old complained that his tummy hurt from laughing. It's not high brow or complex, just amusing and easy to watch. I love Melissa Mccarthy in everything she's in, and I felt she didn't disappoint, Octavia Spencer is very funny too.

Well it wasn't funny but at least they made it so boring that I was forced to stop paying attention. I just wish they had kept the band Slayer out of it!Spoiler Alert: Everyone who watches this is a lesser person for it after.

I love Melissa McCharty,she is funny and always fantastic! Even here despite a terrible dum story and bad actors! I was waiting until the end hoping that at some point the movie will be better but not! Octavia Spencer was terrible and I never said it about anybody ever! Very disappointed!
Not sure why there's so much hate for this movie but I really enjoyed it! Give it a chance :)

Sometimes it's better to make cartoon than movie, like incredible but as movie kind of was it of time and money it was so boring the story was very cliche, I don't know why some good actor's accept to be part of everything that comes through their way , yes the money is important but in which price?

reviews.review_title: Can I have my time back.......PLEAS!!!!
reviews.content: So bad, don"t put your time in this.. how can you make this.

Ben and Melissa pay no mind to bad reviews....it was good...and Octavia...love her 💖... Bobby....one of my faves....😏.... Jason...cute as ever...and the young actors.....adorable....it was silly and funny and that's what counts....(...omg...Jodie foster bit...lol...) Yay Melissa 💖🦋
Humor, entertainment, Of course it doesn't deserve a rating of 10, that's just to get that average up, because I watched a lot worse movies with a higher rating. The low rating is not deserved.
I don't understand why everyone is rating it so bad. This is not meant to be some comic book superhero movie. It's funny and entertaining with a great cast!

Just awful. No chemistry between McCarthy and Spencer and 98% of the jokes fell flat. The story and script were terrible and could easily have turned off with 15 minutes to go and not cared at all. Was on my phone after 20 minutes and not really sure why I sat through the whole thing...avoid unless really desperate.
Love this movie! Great female representation! Fun for everyone!

Most of the humor was lame, & stupid, but it also had some real funny parts too. There wasn't much of a story either. Wouldn't pay to watch it in a theater or pay per view, but it's worth watching for free, or already included with a service I already get.

All plot lines of the film are guessable, another awful female bame mashup that really needs to be addressed, not all movies/series needs this. Its a really poor film in short and Melissa Mc is again her usual self that overly tries to be too funny. She's getting harder to watch, Bateman sunk to a new low too with this but still seems the only positive in a horrible film.

You can't go wrong with Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer. Some of the ratings were low, but I think people didn't understand it was supposed to be ridiculous! It was a spoof! Better than the ratings say. Family friendly.
Who is the writer of this pos? They're not the least bit funny. Netflix paid too much to cast great actors but didn't spend enough to get better writers? What a waste of dollars.
Not entertaining at all and not worth watching.I love the cast, but that's all the positive feedback that I can give.It could of been incredible if it had a great script and plot.

reviews.review_title: Not a classic and forgettable but still some fun
reviews.content: True this film is strictly by the number and a lot of misfire humor but just fun. Melissa McCarthy and rest of the good cast does a good job and fill their roles well. The trouble though is the script for.the roles and movie arnt good.This film won't knock it out of.the Park but if you can endure some of the dragged out jokes you can have some fun watching. Just take it for.whatit is.ifor.wah.
I'm having a difficult time understanding why anyone thought it was a good idea to make this movie.
A few laughs which were good but majority of this just stupid and beyond imbecile. Poor acting by some leads and a daggy story. Such a terrible movie. Speechless.
Melissa McCarthy never lets you down in my opinion.Filled with many hilarious moments and constant laughs.
I thought it was good I liked the music and there were hilarious moments.People are way too critical,it's not Oscar worthy but jts a good light hearted comedy that we all need at times like this.

Offered nothing new, not worth watching.It was so dumb and annoying all it did was make me feel frustrated and annoyed. Put me in a foul mood.Was a first time experience getting that mindset after watching something labeled as a comedy.

reviews.review_title: Hilarious take on the super hero movie
reviews.content: A lot (not all) of the super hero series and movies can be so utterly bland. Crappy dialogues, boring plots, 2D enemies, the few women are only there as trophies, decorative pieces of meat or weak pseudo heroes, people of color rarely play a big part and the only character development we get is "normal human becomes super human"... This movie takes a stab at all that and it's hilarious. Who doesn't find it hilarious? The people that are used to rooting for those typical white male 'heroes' ;)

Yet another film where all the "good-guys" are female and/or black and all the "bad-guys" or idiots or just plain dislikables are white and/or male.From the school bully (even though one of the protagonists is also a bully) being a white boy to the hero's company only employing women (except for the token black male assistant).Some of my favourite films have very strong heroes who are female or black, and they are naturally inclusive - like The Hunger Games: fully inclusive with a female lead in Katniss Everdeen but where everyone - black, white, male, female and disabled - have a role to play and nothing feels forced, unlike so many recent films, including this.SOme funny moments but they were too far and too few between.
It's fine. You'll laugh. There could have been more jokes but you'll enjoy it nonetheless. I do think an R-rated version would have been soooo much funnier but hey.... you get what your given right?

reviews.review_title: Exactly what I wanted it to be!
reviews.content: Ignore the poor reviews! People just hating on a wholesome comedy because it's two ladies. This movie delivered on exactly what it portrayed in the trailer. It was silly and off the wall and kinda stupid but that is exactly what I was looking for. I'm not looking for the next Dark Knight here! I wanted something mindless that would make me laugh and McCarthy and Spencer delivered. It was cute, made me laugh out loud and I enjoyed the escape it provided. Also, shout-out for making a movie based in Chicago that isn't hating on the city!

reviews.review_title: It's all good fun. People will hate on anything these days
reviews.content: What did people expect from a movie like this? Like, seriously? An Oscar contender? People are so hateful, honestly. It's just hating for the sake of hating. This is good, mindless fun. Why can't you just sit back and relax watching this? Not the best movie ever, but definitely doesn't deserve a 3/10PerezReviews.
Diabolical from the start. Managed to watch just over half hour thinking it'll either get better with the story and overall would actually become funny. It didn't.

reviews.review_title: I tried.............. how bad could it be?
reviews.content: I tried to watch it but i just found it sooo bad...... not funny and cringy at times. Got an hour into it and just stopped as i couldn't take it anymore.......what a way to ruin a friday night LOL.

But not from laughter...
The boring spoof is spoofing its cast and crew nothing else. Devoid of laughter or adventure this series of meaningless scenes repels the viewer. I wonder if the writer and director is playing a practical joke on the industry to see how far he can go without people disowning him.So why 2 stars instead of 1? Laser is pretty and obviously doesn't spend anytime in diners.

A truly terrible movie. In this viewer's opinion, it's only worth watching if you want background noise. The one redeeming quality is 10 minutes of silly Jason Bateman; hence my 2-star rating. Netflix will seriously "greenlight" anything..

In general, it's slapstick comedy. Personally, I saw myself and my friend as these two characters. Octavia and Melissa are good friends and on and off screen. On screen they start out as young friends and then reconnect. Same thing happened for my friend and I. They have the same type of humor with Melissa (my friend) being the louder friend who is also the one who brings all the fun to the friendship. Octavia (me) is the level-headed one who is always trying to achieve a goal and grounds Melissa. The story does drag at times but the slapstick comedy that is this film is great for family fun. However, I don't recommend it for younger children if you are the type of parent that forbids cursing in movies. I happen to be the type of parent that tells my children it happens but just don't do it! Aside from that, I loved the movie and would love to see them star in another movie!

Ben Falcone continues to be a problematic writer-director. Here's the thing. I like this cast. There are a couple of light chuckles. Mostly, I like these actors and I appreciate this cast of characters. The most important chemistry has to be Melissa and Octavia.
I don't normally watch comedy movies, but I loved the cast. No regrets, this is hilarious because it's dumb and not serious at all.
The two chracters are rippoffs of cassie cage and jaque brigs from mortal kombat, this movie deserves to be stopped.

This movie is not meant to be taken seriously and you should not. It is rubbish, but a brilliant kind of rubbish. The jokes are corney, script terrible and the action is just bad, BUT, it is so stupid, it is at times hilarious. Watch it without really watching it and you will enjoy it!
I imagene that the only reason this movie was made is because of the MCU's succes. Sadly it misses all the points of a compelling and fun superhero movie. The jokes arent fun.
Worst movie I have seen in a while. Low budget, not funny at all.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst movies I've ever seen
reviews.content: Another painfully unfunny collaboration between Melissa McCarthy and her husband Ben Falcone. McCarthy overacts every seen and runs every flat joke into the ground for way too long, Octavia Spencer looks embarrassed to be there, and I don't know if Jason Bateman was any good because I didn't make it far before giving up.

It's honestly not as bad as some of these reviews are making it out to be. It's certainly better than some other recent well known superhero movies *cough* justice league *cough*It's not high art, some of the jokes are obvious and McCarthy carried the movie but it was entertaining enough to sit through.

reviews.review_title: Dry Slow Action Film. Stopped Watching.
reviews.content: There is zero connection or chemistry between Octavia and Melissa. It's like everyone shot their scenes during dress rehearsal. Idk. I wish they would cast Melissa as a serious actor in a more meaningful film. Even she seems tired of playing this goofy-don't-have-my-stuff-together character. The movie is in general, very slow. So dryyyy. Why is everyone is dryyyy? This is not a chick flick or a comedy, it's a dry action film. It was fun to see Jason Bateman in it I guess. But then there's that weird dance montage. Idk now I can't help but to watch. Just kidding I'm turning it off.
I don't know why the reviews are so bad. Melissa McCarthy is hilarious in this. Her character is very believable. Storyline is a little lacking but definitely worth the watch!!

Love these two ladies - but this movie was awful!! Melissa needs to grow out of these college grunge Town idiot roles fast - no longer funny, and they used to be. She is a great actress and Octavia is world class.

reviews.review_title: A movie to fall asleep to
reviews.content: Such a boring movie! Tiny snippets of funny comments but otherwise it's beyond boring and badly written/directed/acted etc. Worst movie I've seen in a long time.

reviews.review_title: What a waste of a great cast.
reviews.content: Melissa Mccartney is a very funny actor. It's unfortunate that the only roles she takes involve foul-mouthed, clumsy pratfalls along with a liberal dose of fat jokes. She is so much better than that. And to take a cast that includes Jason Bateman and Octavia Spenser and make a movie this bad? What a waste of talent.

reviews.review_title: I always give that woman the benefit of the doubt...
reviews.content: ...only to regret it immediately after.Stop making Melissa McCarthy happen.She is not funny, she is merely annoying.Who spends money producing this piece of c?One of the worst movies in recent memory. And that comes from a fan of both sci-fi and superheroes.

reviews.review_title: The Crab is worth it alone
reviews.content: I am not going to lie, the movie itself is not very good. However, Jason Bateman as the crab is worth it alone. He is the Loki of the Miscreants.
Melissa McCartney is fun as usual, entertaining movie. A good "make fun of" movie!Might not be the most well written action movie, but it was funny and had some entertainment value.

Bad directing
Bad TERRIBLE scriptNot funny at all.

reviews.review_title: Big fan of these ladies...but not this movie.
reviews.content: I was really looking forward to this movie, it should have been so much fun...and it wasn't.A few days after watching it, I HONESTLY can't even really tell you anything about it other than Jason Bateman played a villain who had crab claw for hands.With the actors they had available to them, this story should have been so much more fun. I blame the writing, they had actors who could pull it off...but the writers didn't deliver.This was utterly, atrociously...bad.To the person who said if you liked The Heat and Spy you will love this...WRONG! I loved both of those movies, this one couldn't have been worse. Well...that's not exactly true. If they had left Jason Bateman out, it could have been worse; he was the only redeeming part of the entire flick.So, sooooooo bad!
Well beyond terrible! I guess they made this film to ease their lockdown boredom.
Seriously, who pays for movies like this?At the best this movie is suitable to have in the background while you do something more fun and productive.

I can not for the life of me figure out how and why this movie was made, it is awful to say the least. They could have done so much better than this dreadful affair. There are moments of pure cringe and horrid acting. Some scenes feel horribly forced and you just feel like saying, get on with it already, let the action begin.Isn't there supposed to be a panel of proof readers to check out the script to make sure it is funny enough to air? None of this movie was funny and I'm a really tolerant person who will give any movie a fighting chance, but this and Superintelligence, were annoyingly boring and felt like a chore to watch.Next time, they should hand the director a dictionary to look up the word 'comedy' to see what it actually means.
If you're up for a mindless farce, this is a fun romp. Certainly not "great film", but it's not trying to be one. Turn off your brain for a bit and enjoy!

reviews.review_title: Depends what you are looking for in this film.
reviews.content: It's an OK film with some funny lines.Obviously all the experts on here have slated it, but it's not going to ruin your life and is meant to be daft fun. And that's what it is, daft fun.Let me know when all of you experts make something better........

It is not aimed at fans of action/superhero/comedy movies. Get a grip.It is aimed at Chubby Chasers and Thunder Thighs enthusiasts.I just cannot give it higher stars however because they missed the Rose taco girl from The Last Jedi.

Maybe reading all the negative reviews first lowered my expectation... but we loved it. Kids thought it was great too. So many witty one liners! And there's no arguing with Melissa and Jason's chemistry.
I found it very funny and loved Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer working as a team. The jokes can make anyone of all ages giggle 🙊 but the story is kinda weak.

reviews.review_title: It's hard to find a silver lining to this cloud.
reviews.content: Writing was awful, acting was worse. To have such a talented cast and produce this dud is almost baffling.

Watched this on Netflix yesterday.Pros:
Movie didn't offend me. This seems to be important when making movies nowadays.Cons:
Not very funny for a comedy. Plot was also full of holes.Force feeds some woke themes. Overweight female heroes empowering and beating The King and so on.

reviews.review_title: Family Fun... Not as bad as everyone is saying
reviews.content: This was a nice change to the comedy game when it comes to Melissa McCarthy and Ben Falcone. Usually with their films being a bit more on the vulgar side this is all family fun with some friendly action. It was refreshing to see both of them make something everyone can watch. I enjoyed the film. I'd say give it a shot.
This is supposed to be a family sci-fi comedy, and imho it delivers on this. I had quite some good laughs while watching it. It doesn't deserve all those low ratings...

This movie was engaging. I felt like I could relate to the characters, enjoy the action, and laugh hysterically at the shenanigans! I truly wonder if the negative comments on this movie relate to the mostly female cast.
Some cheap laughs. Decent for turning off your brain but there's not a whole lot of thought in this movie. Not the writers, directors, or audience.

reviews.review_title: Worst Film Ever Made for Melissa McCarthy
reviews.content: When I saw Thunder Force, everything from the beginning to the end looks absolutely weird. The acting is horrible, directing is very bad, and the pace is very slow. During fighting sequences, the VFX and other special effects look like they're done by a film school student who progresses poorly. The casting is poorly done. How could Ben Falcone cast an Oscar winner in a poorly made film? Everything from pre-production to post-production was rushed, which is unacceptable in Hollywood. This film deserves multiple Razzies, including Worst Picture, Worst Director for Ben Falcone, Worst Actress for Melissa McCarthy, Worst Supporting Actress for Octavia Spencer, and Worst Screenplay. I strongly don't recommend you to watch again.

First, the movie has the weird belief that been called a nerd is an insult and that to put it frankly is quite offensive to every nerd. The comedy is forced and it just falls flat more times than not. The banter between the leads doesn't work as well as they obviously think it does. It's still a fun watch though, seeing McCarthy do her thing might be getting old but it's still good fun most times.

Excellent. Fab film. The type of film Hollywood does not often make. Funny, creative, hilarious and indeed sexy! Octavia and Melissa are two of the hottest babes in Hollywood. I love them both and fantasize about both of them and sometimes together - but Lydia takes my cake. Hot talent!So why deducted a point? Thin Laser. That is why.

Thunderforce is an action/ adventure and comedy set after the 1983 cosmic blast. It is set in Chicago, but actually filmed in AtlantaIn a world terrorized by super-villains, one woman has developed the process to give superpowers to regular people. But when scientist Emily Stanton accidentally imbues her estranged best-friend with incredible abilities, the two women must become the first superhero team. Now, it is up to Thunder Force to battle the super-powered Miscreants and save Chicago from the clutches of The King, a money hungry businessman after he loses an election for mayor.My favorite character is Emily Stanton because she is smart and cares about people around her. I liked Thunder force because of the action scenes and the plot. I recommend this movie to people who like superhero movies. I rate 5 out 5.
It's a ridiculous movie but it's got some laughs; people need to stop making everything so serious. It's a silly fun movie, just let it be what it is.

Definitely not a classic but thoroughly enjoyed this movie. Nothing better than chillin in front of the idiot box and taking a break from study for an hour and a half. Very funny, and I knew it was because I watched the aahh trailer, so I knew what to expect. Geez people duh, watch the trailer. If you don't like this genre well then duh, don't watch. Idiots who don't watch trailers, watch the movie, then rate poorly, distract other people from watching something they might enjoy. Take responsibility about your own choices before judging dipsh!ts.

I gave it 2 stars for nothing more than the concept. Could have been a thousand times better but let's face is Melissa McCarthy is not the greatest actress. The best she can try for is comedy and that is barely within her limited acting reach.As for the movie itself, the plot is all over the place, the attempts at humour are beyond forced and miss the mark every time.Watching this movie was painful. In an age of Marvel's Avengers and Justice League, this one should never have gotten off the draft board.
So, this was actually better than DC comic Shazam. Funny and different.

reviews.review_title: Just Take It At Face Value
reviews.content: It's not a marvel movie but it's better than some of the DC fair out there.If you watch this movie I'm going to recommend that you don't overthink it or have extreme high expectations, however, it's cute and simple with an uncomplicated plot.It has a good message of girl power or rather woman power and there is really great positivity with it.It's definitely a good way to chill and relax and waste some time by letting your brain just go with the flow.
Loved this movie! Can't wait to see what they will come out with next! 😃❤
This movie is funny if you catch the references. Melissa McCarthy could read the phone book and it would be funnier than most of the slop on tv.
This is hell. You feel like you want to recoil in horror at the screen. Bad acting, unhealthy body types, stupid so-called action and yes the two 'superheroines' look like actual Wal-mart customers.

Crazy to seeing all these bad reviews but I'm not surprised because seems a lot of people choose to hate women led comedies. Anyway, loved this movie, very fun, and I loved that none of the women had boob windows or cleavage.
Cinematic excellence! An absolute masterpiece! If this film doesn't win an Oscar I will drink a glass of water. Wowee.Also, Jason Bateman is ... Old Bay.

Why do these things have to be so bad, it's not that difficult to write a decent script, can't they copy something like the ninja turtles or elektra ? The basic premise is fine, cast is fine, but the script is terrible, even for a kid movie.

It started off pretty funny, but as soon as the crab was introduced (Jason Bateman with crab arms) it immediately turned stupid - not because of Jason but because of the ridiculous costume. Everything after that just became predictable and not at all funny.

People are looking for something deep in something that is clearly meant to be entertainment only. It's funny, it's cute, and it's entertaining. If you're looking for a deep film with good character development and real threats, this is not it. But it is a great Friday night movie to get a few laughs from. Don't listen to the people that are looking for this movie to be more than it is - a fun time with a couple of historically funny actresses.

Avoid if you value your time, yes some good movie stars but overall film does nothing to want you to keep watching, I can not even compare it on any other films.This is Unique as in comic book start for some reason, 30mins of finding characters portfolio, then random rubbish then makes you think 'what the hell'
Yes avoid this movie
Avoid.
I liked this movie. It is clearly a comedy. It's great it you wanna have a laugh.

Not great although most of the cast are some of my favorite actors. In what universe is Pom Klementieff considered talented? Maybe in video games, but up against Melissa McCarthy, Octavia Spencer, Melissa Leo & Jason Bateman, she is HORRIBLE.

reviews.review_title: Beware of sci-fi movie made by Netflix
reviews.content: 8 out of 10 waste your time and this one has no exception.2 star for Pom Klementieff. Trailer looks fine but the actual movie suck.

Again I watched a movie on Netflix's top 10 list thinking it should be good but clearly is not. Just stop with the list because it's just lies and for Christ sake Netflix stop making garbage stuff and maybe just focus on less projects that are actually good instead of just a large amount of trash. Yes they make great stuff like stranger things and others but 1 out of 100 is not good and then raise your price. Like wtf.

I am a huge fan of Melissa and Octavia and super hero movies, so I was pumped about this film but... my god it's bad. It is bad. There isn't any depth to it, like there hasn't been any real thought. No character development, no real plot line. I wasn't expecting much in terms of story but this just feels so lazy. Such a shame.
This movie sucks.Just awfull.Not funny at all.

reviews.review_title: Don't expect it to be good and you'll have fun!
reviews.content: People complaining are used to marvel movies, this is just silly and fun. If you go into this thinking it's gonna be great then you'll rate it 1 like these idiots. If you go in expecting it to be kinda dumb and ridiculous then you'll have a good time. It isn't great but I definitely was still laughing towards the end of the movie.

reviews.review_title: Bound to be a cult classic
reviews.content: This movie is just what it advertised, fun. So many times people say "if I had powers....", now two women of fairly normal backgrounds do. As i said it's fun. This will probly be The Princess Bride of superhero movies.
Stupid movie. Half way I switched to a different movie, then next day I gave it another shot. Still stupid movie. Waste of time... not recommend it.

Absolutely dreadful totally ridiculous plot not funny in the slightest.Boring and totally dull the best thing about the film is that we switched off about half through, thankfully just before we lost the will to live.

reviews.review_title: Save your time, watch something better
reviews.content: When you consider that Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer have been friends for 20 years, and that Melissa McCarthy's husband directed it, it is a lot easier to see why this film got made. Certainly, it has little reason to exist in its own right. The plot is tired and predictable. The humour is crude and unfunny. There is a shoehorned-in romance that is more cringe-making than anything, and the bad guy is a total joke. The characters are paper thin, and acting almost non-existent. Of all the ways you could have made a superhero movie, this is one of the worst.

I will be honest, I am normally sceptic about the reviews and the average score just because some of my favourite movies have been scored low (questionable taste on my end?) :) and I thought this cannot be that bad with this cast..... Well it is :) To give it a positive spin - it is great mindless entertainment for an evening after a week of home office and kids and crazy + some drinks. By the second glass of wine even some of the jokes seem funny :)

reviews.review_title: Another expected failure of Ben Falcone
reviews.content: It has been years after "the Boss", and again, here goes the boring and chaotic writing/directing presented by Ben Falcone. The difference is that this time, not even Melissa McCarthy can save this horrible product even a little bit.In the first 60 minutes of this roughly 2-hour long movie, there were no actual stories at all, nor anything that is comedic except for McCarthy's shouting. The actual confrontation with the villains is about <10-minute long.To be honest, it is quite ridiculous that Ben Falcone's career as a filmmaker is still... active.

So I watched an hr and it was enough .. I laughed yes because some stuff were really silly that you can not laugh 😅 .. but there was no story I love bothe Octavia and Melissa . But this was just wrong.. it is not a movie .. it is an idea that went really baad.
This is actually a great movie, I don't understand all the bad reviews here. I laughed out loud many times during this movie. It was funny and a great way to relax.

reviews.review_title: For anyone who a review only watched the trailer.....
reviews.content: This movie is awesome! One of the best new superhero concepts out there. Everyone is doing the superhero thing these days and this one fits all bills. It's fun, funny and very entertaining and one of Melissa Mcarthys best movies in a while. So don't knock it until you try it.

This film was just awful and very uninteresting full of cheap and non enjoyable dry humor. Melissa McCarthy has been the same throughout her acting career if it ain't bridesmaid, identity Thief, Tammy. Spy and heat and now this heap of garbage i do dread what she will be starring in next.I did expect better from Octavia Spencer especially coming from what i personally thought was a brilliant back to back acting career such as Ma, Witches, Onward and her small role in instant family. But to see her in this type of film its pretty heart breaking as some people would know she can do a lot more better.I know there is a load more extra characters in this movie, i ain't going to slate them all but i will say this film is definitely a NOT THE ONE TO WATCH!!!! You will never get your 1 hour 46 mins back from watching this film.If i could give it a 0 stars out of 10 i would.

reviews.review_title: This is a very cute movie
reviews.content: We laughed and loved this. The stars are fun and make you smile. I loved it.

reviews.review_title: Why would you do this to paying viewers.
reviews.content: Netflix should be ashamed, it is blowing money on depressing stuff like this.

I don't get these negative reviews. Is it gonna win an Oscar? Yeah, no definitely not. But it's a fun movie to kill time with. At least my husband and I laughed several times. It's not brilliant in anyway, but, again, it's fun. So, give it a try.
Hilarious and funny! Definitely worth a watch. Unsure why reviews are so low. Thought it was great!

First 45 minutes of the movie. Loved. And then it just drastically goes downhill. Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer are amazing, but actors can only do so much. The villains... just bad. And a crab man? Really? What are we.... 12? I'm American and so tired of cheesy, slap stick, dumb American humor. You can make funny not cheesy. This was just BAD on so many levels. Even the fight scenes were poorly choreographed and done. Clunky, unnatural feeling, and they looked stupid. Poorly written and directed. It was just... bad.

reviews.review_title: This is the unfunniest film that i have see in this year
reviews.content: This film is so unfunny but so unfunny That i want to see Foodfight and That s saying a lot. The charaters are dumb and annoying, the Witting Is awful,the. Acting is bad as well, everything in this Film is Bad! Don't watch!
Thunder Force was a funny, feel good, family friendly movie that made me laugh out loud.
I liked it a lot! Had a great time watching it! There's no story worth remembering, it will not be mentioned at the Oscars, but it sure is funny, laughing out loud funney!

I really thought this was going to be a bomb. Melissa McCarthy's signature character can be a little tiresome but it worked in this movie. It was entertaining (my main criteria for a movie), the script and the acting was good and it made me laugh several times. All in all a success!

reviews.review_title: The worst ending i've ever seen
reviews.content: One of the worst movies, too much hype for nothing. Regret watching it.

reviews.review_title: This is a superhero spoof....don't expect Marvel and you won't be disappointed.
reviews.content: Not sure why all the low ratings. If you couldn't figure out from the trailers that this is a spoof of superhero movies, if you were expecting Stark and Rogers, then yes you will be disappointed. But if you go in eyes open, knowing it's a spoof, knowing McCarthy is in it, knowing Bateman has crab arms, you should be able to enjoy it just fine. I wish so called reviewers would stop taking every movie like it is supposed to be a cinematic masterpiece. Sometimes movies are just for silly fun, to make you laugh and to let you escape reality for a bit. This is one of those; a frivolous, goofy popcorn movie.
I would like to know who actually thinks this actress is funny. She's terrible, bad direction too, stupid plot. Come on, iron man already used ACDC songs in the movie, be more creative please?

reviews.review_title: A simple comedy that will make you laugh
reviews.content: This isn't worth a 10 but is certainly not worth the horrible critics it is getting.This movie is a typical McCarthy comedy. It is funny and easy and predictable. It's a fun watch and doesn't have any "big meaning" behind it. It is also refreshing to see 2 plus size women in their fifties (one of them also black) love and live their lives without any of these factors being mentioned. It is totally worth a watch, especially with your mates, with a couple of drinks, when you need a chill night. It probably is a 7.5/10!
It's funny and wierd it is the best movie of the month!!!
Good fun... Don't expect it to change your life, but if you want a silly hour and a half, with daft one liners, slapstick, pretty good visual effects, plus a great cameo from Jason Bateman, try this.

reviews.review_title: Ignore the bad reviews good family movie
reviews.content: Ignore the bad reviews good family movie, teenage kids loved it, i thought it was cringe at some parts but i find that in most modern movies.Give it a go.

I find with Melissa McCarthy, her films can be hit and miss. I really enjoyed The Heat and Spy, so was excited when I saw she had a new film out. The film is good for the first half hour, after that it's like they ad libbed most of the lines and it became unbearable to watch. Its predictable, slow moving and in the end I had it as background noise. Sorry Melissa, this was a miss for me. Octavia Spencer couldn't even save the movie and her "daughter" became irritating after a while. Did love Jason Bateman though, he did it for me. Otherwise I wouldn't watch it again.
This reminded me of a well-done buddy-cop movie of the 90s.

reviews.review_title: People who do not like this movie need to unclench!!
reviews.content: I was expecting the worst because of all the bad reviews. Guess what?? It is a fun movie that knows it's not heading for the Oscars. So many references and little jokes this movie is a fun ride. Jason Bateman is the icing in the cake!! The movie has quirks and is just pleasant to watch. You can watch with the family and just enjoy. I really liked this movie and feel negative people need something to get those sticks out of their butts!! Watch the movie!!! Don't listen to negative reviews.

reviews.review_title: Could have been done Better in terms of Story and Comedy !
reviews.content: Expected more from the storyline and gags.Story overall feels a bit dark and sad with very limited characters and environment.As a viewer i was unable to understand both full strength as a superhero.only that 1 can be invisible and other can load 2k Tonnes of weight.The movie could be better with Fun writing and more showcase of supeheros fighting and other sequence.1st half was boring with very limited characters and all Lab indoor, 2nd half was ok.I expected more fun from this movie.

reviews.review_title: It's not that bad. Don't believe the lowest ratings.
reviews.content: It seems I am one of the few who was entertained by this movie. Agree, it's not pushing boundaries and it's not Oscar material, but it's certainly not a steaming pile of garbage either! It's got a decent story, it's got nice visual effects, it's got humor and the actors do a good job. It works.People who actually think it's cringeworthy and instantly rate it 1 out of 10, must have unrealistically and RIDICULOUSLY high standards! But I do not believe that is the case. I believe most of those are just junk-ratings from people who refuse to think and evaluate it fairly.

reviews.review_title: Not sure why people watch movies they don't
reviews.content: There are no really good movies. They are simply a way to pass. Nothing more nothing less. This movie passed said time.

They made the movie for adults with kids jokes. They should have thought of the target audience first and then decided on the project. How they got their power is so cliché. Nothing original. All predictable.Definitely won't recommend this to anyone.
I'm amazed that people spent money to make this movie as it was a pathetic attempt at humor and/or a plot.
I was looking forward to watching that movie and it was so utterly disappointing.. Humourless, predictable and jst pointless.

Despite the awful reviews, and against better judgment I gave it a chance. I guess because I had such low expectations I actually rather enjoyed it. Utterly ridiculous plot, but that was obviously the case from the title, cast, and trailer. Silly fun, but the crab was worth the time alone.
Fantastic Saturday noon watch. The jokes were greatly timed. Actors were fun.

reviews.review_title: Godawful film trying so hard to be a comedy
reviews.content: If you enjoy ad-libbing that is cringeworthy, forced, and wholly unfunny, this film is for you!Otherwise, the inane & entirely ubelievable characters, pointless dialogue, and a stupid premise makes this an unwatchable waste of 90 minutes.

reviews.review_title: I had to do pranayama after this
reviews.content: I will not waste too much of your or my time reviewing this garbage.So, there. Don't watch it and if you do, make sure you seek professional help afterwards.Have a great life, and then death.

A movie like this really would have benefited if it was rated r because none of the PG-13 jokes land. This is a movie that could have been way better but all in all I knew what I was getting into so it was somewhat enjoyable.

Really Starting to wonder where my Netflix fee's go given the promise of a new movie each week circa 2021 well if this is your example of a new offering it boasts both a waste of time and money and given the fact the cast actually do possess talent this makes this excuse of a film even worse, I understand there is
streaming wars going on but how quickly you can fall behind, Disney+ has been superb prime is delivering beyond my expectations and your offering this keep it up and you'll lose another customer.

reviews.review_title: Joke is on those, who take this movie seriously.
reviews.content: Entering this movie with an ego is not a good idea. I went in like I was watching some live action Hanna-Barbera.show. I had few totally brainless laughs and forgot about it and escaped reality for a moment.

reviews.review_title: Not as bad as I expected it to be
reviews.content:
At first I was really skeptical. Didn't even want to watch. I hate McCarthy. No,really. But at the end I was sold at the super powers idea.Was it funny?eeeh.....not really. It was somewhat cliche. The crab thing was sooo cringeworthy. Would I rewatch? Nah. But-
It was fairly watchable. The acting was okay. The premise was mindless fun. It was not as bad as most people make it oute out to be. Although,yes,the self sacrifice thing at the end was really dumb.
Funny moments and entertaining premise but too much silly bantering. Remove some of that and you would have a better result.

This should be wiped out of this planet. Horrible movie, horrible scenario and bunch of actors that were way better in other movies. Looks like the covid crisis makes them sign up for everything because no other gigs available. I won't play this film even if I have to torture somebody.

I didn't expect much but I expected a HELL of a lot more or at least something....Not going to lie there were a few bits I did laugh out loud, but I just couldn't stomach the rest by the 30 minute point.If your going to make a whacky comedy that's 'out there' don't spend 20 minutes trying to explain the "science" behind what's going on...Be out there oh and above all else be funny!Can't even be bothered finishing this review...Just Trash!*Erases experience from memeory*
The set-up was impossibly long and the pay-off just wasn't there. Jason Bateman was the only reason I stayed with it for more than 50 minutes.I think the only thing killed were 2 careers.

One reviewer once said this is bearable. I for one must really drop my hat for that person, cus he/she has an overwhelmingly forgiving heart, as this is beyond toture for me. Nothing against Melissa McCarthy lowbrow humor, but this is cringeworthy. Octavia Spencer seemed like she knew how bad this was as she was in it and appeared to phone it it entirely.Plz save your precious time and soul. U have better use for it by buying a can of new paint, open it up, and just wait stand there, watching it til it dries.

reviews.review_title: Good actors can't save bad writing/editing/directing
reviews.content: We were looking forward to this film so much, but were devastated at how bad it was. The people who cut the trailer should have cut the movie. It had so much potential, but everything should have been tighter and funnier. Not enough oversight on the writing, directing, or editing choices. Even the cast looked like B actors in this. Do not watch.

reviews.review_title: Ok for a Sunday movie. Dumb entertainment, don't take it serious
reviews.content: This movie delivered exactly what I was expecting from the trailer (which is how I rate movies nowadays), a goofy dumb entertaining movie, that can be watched with family on a weekend. Nothing more nothing less.

Almost didn't watch it because of the bad reviews, but I'm glad I did. It's slapstick, chill, people. Plus, the pop culture references are amazing. I broke down laughing when the they killed Kenny quote appeared out of nowhere. Also: The Crab! I mean, come on people...there are worse movies than that!

reviews.review_title: I don't want to suffer on this mortal realm any more.
reviews.content: Melissa, you really need to step up your ad-lib game. There wasn't any lough out loud moments through the entire movie. The cinematography could've been done by a toddler, point camera and lets hope for the best.Ben Falcone, you need to take a course or night school because this isn't working.

Tried to watch it but could last more than about 30 minutes.The jokes are poor and the plot is worse.I feel sorry for people that like this film because they must have a deranged sense of humour. Lol.

Oh Jason, how can you be seen in this this whatever it is.At least bad films like Robot Monster, Plan 9 from outer space and any Ed Wood films are bad funny but this blah Blah blah bla......sorry my brain died.

Melissa McCarthy can be very funny but this has been the unfunniest movie I have seen so far this year. I literally laughed twice in the whole movie. Maybe preteens might enjoy it but very little fare for adults here, not enough super hero action and almost zero comedy content. Quite disappointing. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Super bad, and not in a good way
reviews.content: This movie is deeply unfunny for a supposed comedy. Even the trailer doesn't make the movie look like its worth watching and thats the whole job of a trailer. Nobody else who saw the movie with me liked it either so that was the group consensus.Not sure any of the actors could have saved the movie due to the poor script, they also didn't seem to be doing their best despite that with rather wooden performances for the most part.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like it but it was boring
reviews.content: It had a few funny parts but it was mostly boring and awkward. I turned it off 3/4 of the way through. I just didn't care about the ending.
Moved at a snails pace, cliche jokes and not much more.

reviews.review_title: What happened to cinematography in the US?
reviews.content: Only trash produced recently. Sunset not only in the state, but also in cinema. Sad, but no more to watch.

reviews.review_title: where is the sense of humor of these people?
reviews.content: It seems that the fierce critics who took the trouble to try to destroy a beautiful film of satirical humor, made by committed and excellent comedians, impeccable production, well-constructed story, hilarious characters have not yet realized this type of films. I realize that there are several types of humor, but if it is not your type of humor, why are you trying so hard to spread your negativism. We are going through a difficult time for humanity, with a terrible pandemic and the planet in pieces, and we have wonderful professionals who work for us. Thank you Netlflix, Thank you Melissa, thank you the whole team. When it comes to you negativists, I believe that life is better without your active participation. Change please, for us, and for you.

reviews.review_title: I thought it was ranked 1 in my country for netflix but it's the rating it has
reviews.content: I enjoy my share of terrible movies, but this one is not one of them. Forced, unfunny, predictable and cringe worthy. Check the trailer, if you still want to give it a go watch the first 10 minuts. If you still want to continue after that you probably made the movie...

This is "Tammy" in a superhero premise. This proves Netflix has $ to burn for this to be greenlit. Long Character Improv that couldnt have been scripted....and stretching of "jokes" that fall waaaaaay flat.Melissa= same character in almost everyone of her films because....well
Message to Ben Falcone. Please Stop. There is no cure for nepotism.

Well it wasn't all bad.... There were many cringes but like, it's still kinda funny. I gotta say even though Melissa McCarthy basically plays the same kind of people in every movie, she's petty good at jokes and stuff.Anyway, it's not good, definitely not the choice of you're not out of comedies to watch. However if you'd like something to relax on, you can choose to watch this. You might even like it. I know I do, kinda.

This so called movie is an insult to the humanity. Melissa, Octavia, Jason and Bobby, what in the hell? The characters are so bad and you can feel the low level of comfort in each of actresses and actors. Who approved a "raw chicken" nonsense and had guts to include it in the credits?Ben Falcone should not be allowed to write or direct anything ever again.Really disappointing and embarassing all around.
If you gave this a low score you take yourself to seriously. Perfect antidote to the times and no blood clots! THE joke is on you. Or is it joke is on you?

There was barely a laugh to be found (and I was high as a kite while watching it)! Octavia Spencer's acting was really bad...she was very miscast.Do yourself a favour and save the hour and 45 minutes to watch paint dry...you'll be far more entertained.
Was really looking forward to this, two great actresses....don't bother, don't waste 2 hours of your life!

So far in the running for worst film of the year. Not one chuckle. MM ad-libbing.... STOP ALREADY!!! Ben Falcone can't direct to save his own life. No plot, horrible written trash, 'jokes' that go on way too long, just. Utterly bad. Save this time to ask God for forgiveness for thinking this is a good film.

reviews.review_title: I promised myself I wouldnt watch it
reviews.content: Should have stuck to my promise. Jason Bateman should be made wear those crab arms for a year as punishment. Just awful.

reviews.review_title: Cheesy, a bit cringy but it's entertaining if nothing else
reviews.content: The future mayor uses fear plus supervillains to be elected, the crab is a villain/henchman that goes semi-good at the end, having a romance with the superhero. The silly superheroes are both "big" women and seeing them become superheroes from scratch... All things I liked. The cringy parts, like the raw chicken thing... Went on a little too long.But it was solid entertainment. Like I managed to turn off my brain a bit when I watched this, and I needed it.There were some moments when I felt this movie was kinda SNL-ish but still, entertaining, and at the end of the day, that's all it needed to be.

reviews.review_title: this is what a great and misunderstood movie looks like
reviews.content: A classic piece yet to be understood by it's contemporaries...
A sad way to use greats Oscar winners like Melissa Leo and Octavia.
First the positive, I like both lead actresses...there were genuine funny lines and moments peppered throughout the movie ... but i saw too many political shout outs.

reviews.review_title: Not as bad as people say it is.
reviews.content: Why are people being so harsh with the ratings?It was enjoyable to watch as a Netflixs movie. They had a good cast and some funny scenes. I didn't like all the politics and biased opinions.

reviews.review_title: The worst movie I have ever seen.
reviews.content: This is the worst movie I have ever seen. Please for the love of god don't watch it.

reviews.review_title: This is not a superhero movie
reviews.content: Boring as hell and not really a super hero movie. I watch all superhero movies and tv series. This is just bad and supposed to be funny but it is totally not! The person who wrote the play has never read a comic in his life. This movie is a waste of time.

I don't understand all the negative reviews. Probably from dudes who can't enjoy a movie where the women are the main characters and don't talk about men the whole time. Were there some dumb parts and a few bits that went on a little long? Yes, maybe, but there were also some laugh out loud moments and a couple of genuine guffaws. The young woman who played Octavia's character's daughter was FANTASTIC. Jason B and Bobby C were hysterical. Melissa Leo's deadpan former FBI humorless character was a crackup. A very fun romp.

reviews.review_title: Silly witty fun. Ignore the low rating.
reviews.content: I don't understand all the hate and negative comments. This was just cute silly fun. People can't appreciate just a fun playful show. I enjoyed it, my kids enjoyed it. Totally worth a watch!!!!
Good cast but the writing is bad the directing is left a lot to desire...it didnt even try to be funny....waste of the talented cast..

reviews.review_title: Netflix Bust!! Worst movie in 20 years
reviews.content: This is probably the biggest bust since water world. From the writing to the acting this is the worst movie I have seen in 20-30 years. Better luck next time Netflix. Please someone tell the person who gave the okay to make this movie NO!!!

reviews.review_title: The "Mystery Men" of the Covid Content Era.
reviews.content: Was really hoping for much more with this cast, but...man. Really bad. But it was nice that Melissa gave her husband a shot.
Can't understand why are they making this kind of movies nowadays. 23minutes of it and I was done. Garbage.
My daughter aged 12, left the room after 10 min of watching this.
OMG, this movie is really something. Not funny, disgusting, bad actors, nice purple lambo. And thats all. Turned off after first 'superhero' scene.

I'm surprised this movie has such bad reviews, I'll admit it. It is the typical fat girl comedy movie but I would be lying if I said I wasn't laughing the whole time (coming from a chubby girl lol). It's so bad that it's hilarious.

reviews.review_title: Yikes! You'd be hard pressed to find a worse movie right now.
reviews.content: This movie being popular is a testament to how bad the movie market is right now. I can normally sit through a bad movie but god was this bad. It never got better, it was just horrible from start to when I shut it off. Netflix should give us a month free for submitting this to watched. The director, cast, and whoever agreed to fund this should be punished for making this by making them watch it.

A non-existent plot, terrible acting, unfunny script
Please save yourself 90 minutes of your life and do something more entertaining like punching yourself in the face there is nothing (and that's an achievement in its self) good about this film.
I really looked to watching this film,but after seeing it I was not overwhelmed by it at all. I suppose I was expecting a really type of high octane comic super hero movie,but it was ok in the end.

Read the reviews and thought wow brutal. I mean if you're wanting Marvel-esc movies this is not the movie you're looking for. It's not the super amazing action film with the best in depth story line by all means but if you're looking for easy laugh feel-good watch then this hits the mark! Is it cringey ASF? Yes. Did I laugh? Yes! Did I enjoy this without going in with super high expectations? Yes! Overall did I enjoy watching this - Yes!!!!
If you are looking for a high quality film in this, you've been living under a rock fir the last 29 years. If you are looking for a good chuckle, watch this movie.
It's suppose to be silly and I enjoyed it! Why can't stupid humor be a good movie. I laughed out loud and at times shook my head but laughed. Just a good silly movie!

reviews.review_title: People! It's a Spoof! And it worked
reviews.content: Is it the best movie ever? Of course not! But it is on par with Airplane as a spoof. A spoof of the super hero genre. I went in with no expectations and laughed openly many times throughout the movie. If you enjoy spoofs and accept it for being that it is a fine way to be entertained for a little while. Watch it and enjoy - with kettle corn is the best way...
The two leading actresses are too old for this movie and aren't funny at all. Nothing made me laugh.

Laser is a thin blondie.This film is asking you to spend 2 hours and $14 so you can watch the type of women you run into at the food court or anywhere else in the mall as they shuffle their tattooed lard along the floor going to a destination that maintains their lard or embarrasses the rest of us.Why would I want to watch that and pay for it for 2 hours????It is everywhere already.

It's still pretty much quarantine and I've watched literally everything else. Everything in the world is terrible, so this is at least not racially motivated violence in the streets...so there's that.
At some time I thought why I am watching it. It's unbearable.
It was a nice change from the border crisis our fake president has made! #SAVETHECHILDREN.

The movie was fun, silly, and light. All of the talent is very charismatic, and elevates the somewhat questionable plot. Everyone involved is clearly having a lot of fun, and that makes it an enjoyable experience to watch. No one is winning an Oscar for this movie, but if someone put this on, I would happily rewatch it.
They were hilarious as always! Just a great all around funny movie!

reviews.review_title: Lighten up.. it's SUPPOSED to be stupid!
reviews.content: If you've watched any of McCarthy's movies, you KNOW she's gonna be slapstick and stupid funny. This movie is no exception. These aren't meant to be Oscar Winning performances. It's just something funny (yes humor IS subjective) to watch. So if you're in the mood for some mind numbing don't-have-to-take-it-seriously entertainment, this is perfect.

This movie was actually Laugh Out Loud Funny. If you're looking for something serious, not your movie. But if you're looking for something light and funny-feel good kind of movie-then this is it. Clean, fun, funny.
I had fun seeing this movie. Entertaining, funny and a bit cliché. But with the world turning upside down in real life ... this movie is a welcome distraction.

The writers couldn't let go of their ridiculous leftist bias to realize they got the details almost right, just on the wrong teams. The background story is that the mayor of Chicago is running for re-election (he's the "Trump" character) and the "progressive" Hispanic woman is moving up in the polls.
