So this guy gets all the mutants to cause chaos so he has a problem to fix. Think of the mutants (miscreants) as BLM and antifa. Only problem is that they got it all backwards. But that is the MO of the left - accuse your opponent of doing what you're actually doing. If they made the crazy mayor the "amazing progressive" and the underdog opponent the grassroots conservative who actually cares about making the city better instead of filling diversity quotas, destroying the economy, and stoking division, then the story would have been true to reality. They certainly took their artistic liberties here.The funniest part of the whole thing is that they accidentally showed that if you work hard, you can achieve anything no matter where you came from or what you look like. Whoops, that was an unfortunate oversight. Guess the poor, silly, slobby one just forgot to utilize her "privilege" and Spencer just had some magical ability to overcome the "institutional" obstacles standing in her way. What a miracle.They should probably work harder to push their agendas next time instead of focusing on things like story, character development, and dialogue.There were some funny moments. Enjoyed the bit where McCarthy was trying to get Spencer to recognize Urkel and Nell.

The amount I cringed during this movie was unbelievable. Never have I seen such an awful movie - I'm not exaggerating, this is the worst movie I've ever watched. Save yourself the pain (yes, physical pain caused by the amount of cringing you'll do during this watch) and for the love of god, choose a different movie. I'd give my entire paycheck to go back in time and get back the 100 minutes I spent infuriated over the idiocy shown on screen. The jokes are childish and the plot is completely mindless. Do. Not. Watch. Please, save yourself.

I really feel like Melissa McCarthy gave a great performance in this for what she was doing and Olivia was great. Even the supporting actors did a fantastic job for what they were doing. But the whole superhero mechanic doesn't quite work right they make mistakes that are blatantly wrong based on many other movies/shows. Way too many really old references that really aren't going to be appreciated by anybody under the age of 40 to 45.I don't want to ruin the movie but when I got to the end it was just silly, the way things played out made no sense. Anyone with half a brain would do things differently, and it just feels like yet another cheap effort to add weight to what is transpiring. This is going to hold this one back and get a lot of bad reviews because a lot of people aren't going to understand the jokes that are being made.Howeverr, I hope they give us another go and take some of the criticism and make a better sequel!In the end though I would say give this a watch. You will know within 15 to 20 minutes is you want to continue. I did find it entertaining to a degree 😃

reviews.review_title: It was what it was supposed to be: goofy and just fun
reviews.content: If you watch this expecting to watch a movie just for fun, as most Melissa McCarthy movies are, you will not be disappointed. It is exactly as expected: goofy, ridiculous, and though not hilarious, amusing and entertaining.

This is not a brilliant comedy with everlasting jokes, but a simple, cute twist on the SuperHeroes' genre, with nice messages and just a few gross scenes. I liked it for light watching, and will be recommending it further.

When I saw the trailer for this movie I wanted to watch it right away. Glad I did! It was as expected a comedic superhero movie. There's funny quips, a good story and decent action! I watch a lot of movies and this is one I recommend watching. The reason for an 8/10 is because there are slow moments but they picked it up right after.

The movie was intended to be silly and childish because SURPRISE, it's a movie meant for children. It was entertaining, funny, easy-to-follow, and didn't take itself so seriously as so many superhero flicks do. McCarthy and Spencer did really well and it was cool to see Jason Bateman show up too! It's just fun dumb entertainment and I'm here for it.

reviews.review_title: I'd give it a 0 if I could.
reviews.content: Boring, predicable, stupid. Do not waste your time!
Couldn't continue watching, stopped in the middle...
Seriously this is the worst movie, its soooo boring it's unbelievable.

reviews.review_title: Sung to The Tune Of AC/DC's Thunder Struck
reviews.content:
Thunder Thighs
Thunder ThighsI was caught in the middle of two thunder thighs (Thunder)I looked 'round, and I knew there was no turning back from the crushing grips (Thunder)My mind raced, and I thought "Darn she is a regular at Burger Shack" (Thunder)And I knew there was no help, no help from the lard (Thunder)Sound of the Thigh drumsBeatin' in my heartThe thunder of thighs (Yeah - I mean NO)Tore me apart.

I found this Film very funny, I loved Jason Bateman performance especially. His claws and the way he scuttles sideways just kills me.I get why people didn't enjoy it, maybe you have to be in a silly mood. The set up of the relationship of the lead characters maybe goes on too long, but I love Octavia Spencer in everything.

reviews.review_title: Fun to watch female-led superhero spoof
reviews.content: Watching the movie right now; I like it! Yes, it's not a Marvel movie blah blah blah but it's very funny (Jason Bateman as the Crab; that dream dance with McCarthy - brilliant!) and as an action/superhero spoof it works really well.Another huge plus (for me as a 40+ female viewer): the two main protagonists are two strong women in my age-bracket; all of the key sciencists/researcher characters in the story are female; there are both male and female baddies; good ratio on the diversity front, too. Unlike quite a few of the classic Marvel/Multiverse movies.I find it refreshing to see such a female-forward production and sure, this is a very much a light relief-type of comedy/spoof but so what? It's an enjoyable 90 minutes.

reviews.review_title: Such a waste of talented actors..
reviews.content: No fun at all... I couldn't finish the film.. the first act lasts forever.. I feel sorry for Mellissa and Octavia, because te script doesn't make any justice to their talent... Terrible movie.. full of clichés, too slow. Don't waste your time!

Alittle campy but it was nice to see these two work together because they have portrayed many female characters that are outside of the expected norm roles. The story line was good. The actors great. The comedy great. If it could have gotten a 10, it would have needed a little bit of drama that was less comedic for me. It's like I know it's a comedy, but it's also about super villains. Both of these actresses have played roles before that combined drama and comedy very well before with even a dark twist here and there. They totally could have pulled it off here with a little scripting. Would not have to be an edge of seat nail bitter, but everyone in this film could have pulled off this story line of it went into a more challenging level. I hope the directors and actors give the idea another try with that in mind. I will probably watch it again though. Funny.
Mind asking? Why did they do this movie? I mean. It was bad and sort of.
Its was bad from two very tallented actresses. Octavia looked very uncomfortable throughout the movie. With all of Melissas comic talents, she never got out of first gear.
I tried...believe me I tried. I felt like I lost a few brain cells after watching the first 15 minutes of this movie. Move on. Don't waste your time. You're welcome very much.

Ben Falcone continues to be a problematic writer-director. Here's the thing. I like this cast. There are a couple of light chuckles. Mostly, I like these actors and I appreciate this cast of characters. The most important chemistry has to be Melissa and Octavia. One gets.

reviews.review_title: Bag full of nope. Back in the day, this would have been direct to video.
reviews.content:
Ben Falcone is a great and funny guy. However, his scripts and direction lack critical editing. I'm not even half way through this painful movie and I already know how it plays out. And being formulaic isn't the worst part. It's slow. None of the scenes or dialog is tight. The scenes lack rhyme or reason, never mind being nuanced or clever. The lame jokes beat you over the head.Melissa and Octavia's character development takes way to long for what it provides and you end up not even wanting to like either one once they grow up.I'm sorry, but if Melissa's contract says Ben gets to write and direct x number of films, the studio needs to demand ghost directors and writers.Like other efforts with Ben, this comes off as half baked and unpolished. This wasn't developed enough to start shooting. There should have been 20 table reads to tune everything up. If there were actual readings, no one dared make improvements. Dialog is stiff and there isn't any of the well-timed banter that these actors are known for.So many little things aggravated me, because they were just plain lazy.Example:
Bateman's character should ALWAYS walk sideways, not just a couple times.This movie was a disservice to the actors and Falcone. Even Bobby Cannavale doesn't have enough good dialogue to save the scenes he's in.They all have much more talent than was put on film. You could trim 35 minutes and not miss a thing. I'm really surprised it got released in this form.This is Ghost Dad levels of power and irresponsiblity.Watched til the end....and regret it. It got worse. It's obvious, no one at the studio stepped in - at any point - to fix this.They just wanted to get the obligation off the books. Not a good way to run a successful business or career.

I've never seen such obvious exposition writing before in my life. The first (and only) 20 minutes I watched just slowly out loud explain such obvious things that I felt like either the writer is dumb or thought their audience was. "I haven't talked to her in 20 years" there was absolutely no reason to state this out loud to the diner owner nor the audience. We got that. I couldn't even make it to the part where their superheroes.You can really tell poor Octavia Spencer knows how bad the script is and is trying her best but obviously doesn't care.
The worst. Can't even laugh or smile. No point. Wasting time.My first time to give a bad review.
I just don't get the bad reviews!! I've watched it three times and it keeps getting better and better!!! Chicken and surf n' turf!!! Enough said!! 😂😂
Thunder thunder thunder thunder pants...... Worst then bloody awful & that being polite.

reviews.review_title: If you wanna see how bad a movie can get and got nothing else to do....
reviews.content: I must admit I'm an avid review reader and I love this app.... I just could not believe that the movie would be so bad so..... I ended up watching it...... I could not watch it in one sitting ....I took about a couple of hours break... came back and finish the last 20 minutes.There is no way that somebody will not want to watch it after reading all the bad reviews because as we all know as Americans bad press is press so would that said plan for having nothing to do with your brain because if you have nothing else to do it is better than nothing...

reviews.review_title: Movie is random Comedy and I love it!
reviews.content: What did people expect here for the film? Its a Parody random comedy and they nailed it. Its supposed to be silly what story did people expect??!Chill Y'all.

I didn't expect much from this, even so I was disappointed, and, if I'm honest, a little surprised at just how bad this movie is. It's rare I can't get all the way through a film, but to complete this would have been an exercise in masochism, nothing more. The humour was beyond "not funny" and out the other side where I felt embarrassed for them. It was almost as though they felt that if they stretched a single awkward scene on for long enough, then it would eventually become funny. It doesn't. It just gets more awkward.A waste of some good talent (Octavia Spencer and Jason Bateman) on a movie that should never have got past a drunken pitch (nobody sober could have thought this was a good script).It's a shame because if handled well, the base premise could have worked.Avoid.

reviews.review_title: Laughed until tears ran from my eyes
reviews.content: It took a bit to get going but McCarthy and Bateman are great together. The whole film is lighthearted and the few gross things (chicken) are so well done that they are a high point. We watched it on the weekend and I told a colleague Monday that she should see it only for her to exclaim about it to me. Really liked it. Not sure what the other reviewers are going on about but reading between the liners, they are busy waiting for Fast and the Furious 35 or something.

"Thunder Force" manages to make great actors like Olivia Spencer and Melissa McCarthy look like lifeless puppets, struggling to get through one shallow scene after the other.The director and producer must have been blind or on drugs the entire time of filming because WHY would they do this to them?!?!And the guy responsible for the script should be tasered. Like on max setting. Horrible, horrible work.Netflix - you should be ashamed of yourself. Did nobody bother to read that screenplay???

reviews.review_title: Seriously.. Do you even call this a movie?
reviews.content: Nice concept, STUPID movie, LAME jokes, RIDICULOUS villain.. Sheer waste of time.
A lot of harsh reviews, IMDB reviewers are tough! 😹 My Mom passed in 2016 and I would have loved to watch this with her. It's a funny, entertaining film and well...lighten up people.

reviews.review_title: Unfunny, generic, forgettable, awful, boring, pathetic mess.
reviews.content: The movie attempted to make jokes, but they never landed, it wasn't even toilet humor that, on occasion, most could find funny while at least being intoxicated, no these were throwaway jokes and lines you have seen in 100 movies before this, but delivered in a manner that is as unfunny as humanly possible.I felt like Netflix execs were just laughing their way to the bank while this platforms self-promoted trash was in top 10 in my country on the top row of Netflix with a featured trailer.It used to feel like a breath of fresh air how Netflix could green light smaller and riskier movies and series to be made, but now I see mostly generic garbage that is relatively safe for them and gets sequels, I bet they will make a sequel for this bag of turds too.

reviews.review_title: Pretty bad, except for Melissa McCarthy
reviews.content: As mentioned in the title, I can't find anything watchworthy about this movie except for Melissa McCarthy, and even she is only mediocre here.It's predicable, unfunny and cringy. Some scenes would be funny as a zero-budget YouTube sketch, while others are just plain stupid and annoying.Watch it if you really like McCarthy, superheroes, and have some time to waste. Otherwise, go watch something else. It's not like there's a shortage of superhero movies or series, and every Marvel movie (even if you're not a Marvel fan) does comedy better than this.
I'm pretty sure Falcone hare his wife and wants to destroy her! I don't k le why Melissa keeps doing movies with this man.JUST STOP!!!!

Based on the other reviews, these women have appeared in other works. I've never seen them before though.....and I'm glad I watched this movie. Normally the only time I watch large women is when they are performing pro wrestling.....I enjoyed this movie. I especially liked what the big girl and Bateman did with raw chicken.

Freaking awesome! Absolutely loved the combination of superhero, comedy, and two live sized actresses. They were hilarious. Where are my action figures? I would like to have an action figure for these two sitting on my work desk. Movie was quirky, fun, and it was just right for a Saturday afternoon. I will be watching it again soon. Thunder Force 2 please!
If you're a fan of Melissa McCarthy, and is looking for fun and entertainment, it won't disappoint you. If you're looking for anything else... well, go look somewhere else.

reviews.review_title: Basically a 90s kid's tv movie but without any charm
reviews.content: This is the kind of movie that makes you ask: is comedy dead? There isn't any plot - it's a shameless cliche olympics. The characters don't have any semblance of character just labels: nerd and lazy. There's no chemistry. Finally there is no humor. You won't be able to finish this movie if you love yourself.People worried about carbon footprint of NFT's should rather ask how much energy did this movie spent. Because it truly was the biggest and most atrocious waste you could imagine.
Its not going to win any awards or anything, but it entertained me and my kids. Its very bad writing, but the actors were alright. I've definitely watched a hell of a lot worse.

Ben Falcone needs to stop making movies with his wife!! The entire movie sucked and should of never been made!!! Very stupid punch lines, bad acting, amd very cheesy!! Don't bother watching this garbage at all! Do yourself a favor and stay away from this POS!!

reviews.review_title: Had potential, but it has been poorly casted
reviews.content: I was looking forward to watching this, especially as the trailer looked pretty good! It had a lot of potential and Melissa McCarthy makes sense for the writing, but Octavia Spencer is a terrible choice for this sort of cheesy comedy, it just didn't work. Their relationship dynamic is very flat and forced and the humour generally just doesn't land well. As always Melissa McCarthy does what she does best, but it is so out of place in this film due to the surrounding actors. Needed more comedy actors! Shame really.

Short review this movie is just gross, weird and bad a lot of stuff just make no sense Melissa McCarthy act in this movie is just not right.For me 15 mins into the movie and I want to switch off, Most of the scene are just gross and "Unwatchable"Thunder force? More like Thunder flop.

The first 15-20 minutes were passable with some funny lines on Mccarthy's part. ("This car is making me ovulate. I want to have little purple Lamborghini babies") I began to believe that this might just work. And then it just became absurd, stupid, nonsensical, unfunny and dumb. Poor story, massive plotholes, ridiculous scenarios. Thunder Force stinks, like a huge Thunder Fart.

One of the most boring movies I've ever seen. First it seems like a superhero movie, but nothing really happens, what you don't expect, the story is trash and after 30 minutes, my smartphone was the only thing I focused on :(

Sir, you met her, you saw her, you married her.Stop foisting her unto us. Just stop. Does she absolutely have to be in the movie business? Can she count? Give her an abacus and put her in a cubicle in accounting.What was this? This film crushed me.
Just awesome.. Storyline, acting all are awesome, just watch it guys..

reviews.review_title: Really guys, it's not that bad..
reviews.content: I too, like a reviewer before me will keep this short. Watch the movie, it has some funny moments, it's not that serious, calm down people. This is no academy award winner, the acting isn't horrible besides maybe the youngest version of Lydia. Would I watch again? Probably not. But the movie does what it needs to do (in a pretty predictable way). But if you genuinely like the cast, you'll be happy to see them regardless. 5.7.

First ten minutes with the characters as kids were OK. After that it went completely downhill. The script is absolutely dreadful and makes no sense whatsoever. I love MM but there was way too much of her stereotyped overacting from the off, which didn't fit in here. Switched off after 40 minutes or so. Don't waste your time, I'm warning you!
I don't know how anyone would think this is entertainment, however if Netflix can fund this level of undiluted dry content without shame they obviously do not value their customers.

reviews.review_title: The Superhero Film we've all been waiting for
reviews.content: After years of dark and bleak superhero films, this film brings the fun back to the genre and reminds us that superpowers are something to enjoy.The comedy isn't for everyone, and some of the jokes are a bit cringey. But if you're willing to stick with the film it's a great laugh overall.Complete with a great cast, great characters, and some powerful lessons I recommend this film to all you superhero enthusiasts.

reviews.review_title: Eating raw chicken IS gross...but it's funny too!
reviews.content: It's funny 'cause you know it's not real chicken, but McCarthy goes out of her way to sell it! My favorite part is when she's trying to sign off from the vid call and she's like 'well it's just you and me, I guess' and drops the chicken down into her mouth from over her head. And Octavia and her daughter are still watching like 'OMG, please end this call'Yah, my sights were set super low due to all the bad reviews on YouTube and IMDB and that may have helped in my enjoyment of the film. Not a constant 'knee slapper', but I don't think it was meant to be. McCarthy and Spencer play well off each other and I believed their friendship as well as the minor tensions that develop prior to the third act. The supporting cast worked for me too; Cannavale was an intimidating creep, Laser, that baddy you wanted to see get her come-up-ins, and of course Bateman's Crab guy. Bateman 'doing Bateman' with his subtle quips and comments. I cracked up every time he scuttled off screen when fights started - how he ends up having a thing for raw chicken too -just ridiculous!All in all a good time was had. It's definitely more of an action comedy/super hero movie more than a straight up comedy. McCarthy and director/husband Falcone collabs offer their own brand of entertainment; much like, say, an Adam Sandler or Will Ferrel effort might. And like Sandler and Ferrel, they don't always hit the mark. Thunder Force sticks the landing and delivers an often funny action movie steeped in the 'super-hero' origin story trope. Those looking for anything else will be left with a bad 'taste' in their mouths. Like a raw chicken taste:) Go Thunder Force!

This was such a heartwarmingly funny film about friends who become superheroes. Hilarious in many parts and so entertaining. Melissa McCarthy always makes me laugh. The pairing of Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer as two unexpected superheroes was so cool, and Melissa McCarthy is one of the best comedic actors on screen. The premise of the film and its cooky plot were a welcome treat. Enjoy this film and don't pay any attention to some of these less than flattering reviews here. The world is full of cynical, critical people these days, and besides it appears that when women are the main characters in film a lot of shade gets thrown. Get some popcorn, enjoy the movie, and be prepared to laugh out loud. 🤣
I had to force myself to finish the movie I couldn't enjoy any joke any scene and it's such a shame i was excited for the whole superheroes theme but it was a complete disappointment.

reviews.review_title: Reviewing it just because everyone is hating on it
reviews.content: Giving this movie a 5 because its a pretty average film. Can't say I was excited when I saw it existed, but upon watching it I can say it's entertaining and has its moments of laughs. Nothing here is gold but people giving it 1s is absurd. I don't know why people these days are such harsh critics. I get that Netflix could invest this money into better things instead of making watchable not so great movies, but people need to calm down and just enjoy things for what they are.Sure this is a hodgepodge of typical superhero cliches and often bottom of the barrel humor. Some could even argue one of Melissa's worst movies. However, I still think there's a decent plot line here and enough to keep you watching until the end. We aren't talking the greatest chemistry but it's not nearly as bad as people are making it out to be in these reviews. I think people need to keep their day jobs because reviewing movies is not for you. 1s and 3s should be reserved for much worse tripe. Believe me I have seen far worse. If this is your idea to get Netflix to spend their time making better movies I get it but be honest with people and say it it how it is.

Strong women always welcome. Melissa and Olivia's real chemistry translated well to this film. They are both super talented. Melissa's physicality is always on point. The younger stars who played them as kids and teens were great. This film had enough laughter to keep me engaged. I watch all the superhero movies and I didn't expect this to be Marvel which helped. I wanted to despise the evil characters more and I did not. This is the kind of movie that I would watch again and again if it is on tv when I am flipping through, which is exactly what I hoped. As a Melissa super fan I can easily say that Superintelligence wasn't that great in comparison, and Thunder Force was way better. I hope Olivia and Melissa do more films together. Taylor Mosby was perfectly cast in this movie. She's one to watch.

While not the best effects, writing or plot I got pretty much what I expected out of this, a film that made me laugh a few times while waiting for the inevitable "Good Triumphs Over Evil" ending.So, it had a few moments that made me laugh, but what else? Well, that's where it falls a bit flat, what we're left with is some dodgy dialogue, a very thinly veiled plot and some irritating characters to string it all together, a lot of the jokes didn't really land for me, we get it, fat people are hilarious! Let's all laugh at them because if we picked on any other attribute it could be seen as offensive or bullying, but those fat people? Hell, they've got thick skin right? Right?PCNonsense aside, this film felt like an attempt at an origin movie for a set of heroes, but it didn't really give them any outstanding enemies to fight, they made a big thing about how dangerous one character is and then pretty much take that away in another scene, so the whole film felt like it was trying to set something up, but nothing really landed.However I obviously didn't hate it or else the score wouldn't be so high, it is, a middle of the road movie, something to put on when you have nothing else to do and just want some background noise, I couldn't rate it lower because I've seen much worse, couldn't rate it higher because I've seen much better, it's a so-so, watch once then forget it kind of a film.Jason Bateman was ok, not on his best, Octavia Spencer was ok, not at her best, Melissa McCarthy was . . . You get where I'm going with this by now right?They've all done bigger and better things, but there's worse out there too, I don't think the movie deserves all of the 1 star reviews, because that implies it is quite literally the worst thing out there, the downside is too many are only willing to go with a 1 or a 10 and not meet the middle ground, this was a 5, could be better, could be worse.It had some ok running gags in there that actually worked, some that didn't, and the ones that did, actually kinda made up for the failures.Not sure I'd watch it again, but oddly, I'd probably watch a sequel just to see if they managed to improve.
Deserves one star just for Jason Bateman doing his crab walk. Rest of the movie makes me want to unsubscribe from Netflix for even green lighting this.

reviews.review_title: At Last Something to Make You Laugh
reviews.content: This is not a movie that critics will like. It is in the genre of FUN. Fun are movies like Sister Act and Beverly Hills Cop. A fantasy movie with subtle jokes thrown-in to take one away from pandemic and the difficulties of our time. Everyone needs to laugh. At times it may be silly but we need more silly. Melissa and Olivia are having fun and we are there with them. There are no deep philosophical thoughts or social and political agendas. It's just fun. The movie is like a ride in an amusement park...just FUN.
I thought it was funny and enjoyed it. There's a lot of haters on here.
It is so bad movie. I do not know what happen Netflix.
Nooo this movie literally awesome😂😂😂im laughing the whole time u guys idiot.
I agree with a lot of the poor reviews, but I still managed to laugh out loud here and there. If you're looking for something silly/mindless to watch after a long day, this will do the trick.
I laughed a lot and i love melissa mccarthy and octavia spencer. I think the goal of this movie was to show that women of any size and color can do anything and it doesn't have to be a man.

reviews.review_title: I wish I never wasted 1h 30 mins of my time with this garbage
reviews.content: This movie felt like satire in its entirety. Like I get it, it's a movie, go crazy with your fantasies - but c'mon, atleast put SOME reality. This movie is garbage and I'm saddened that Netflix is airing this stuff.

The fall of HollywoodComedies that are not comedicFat and obesity and general unhealthiness (American body types)and of course the notion that films need to be farted out even when there is no story, acting or reason.. they just need more... content.
I rarely give reviews but this film was so bad I had to warn people! Lame acting and a puerile script, please make better use of your time!

I needed something to just enjoy and not have to think much about. This film was perfect for that as I enjoyed the ridiculousness of the plot and some very funny moments throughout. Glad to see Melissa McCarthy, Octavia Spencer and Jason Bateman (as well as others) just having some ridiculous fun.It's worth noting that throughout this film there is a real emotional undertone if you want that too.If you're looking for a hard hitting social commentary though that is full of CGI action then this isn't for you.For a good laugh and just to relax this film is ideal though.

I wish I could go back in time and break my fingers so I couldn't press watch. So bad. I normally don't mind tongue in cheek humour. Not sure what I expected but this wasn't it. Sorry ladies not your best work. Couldn't even finish it.

I laughed frequently during this movie. Since so many comedies fail for me on this level, this was great. Also, the fact that the superheroes, plus the daughter, were not skinny as pins was quite charming and different. I'm not sure why this movie was not liked more. A fluffy and thoroughly enjoyable time.

The history of two friends is very weird. How they were able to be friends if never hang out together and basically one girl always told to other "I don't have time for you, I need to study".Also, some jokes like grandmother said "you should be married together" - it just so weird.

reviews.review_title: I am not sure there was a script......

I managed to get a few minutes in before falling asleep!By the end of the movie I felt very rested 🤣

Such a stupid movie lmao. I liked the main actors but still the entire movie is just ridiculous. Poor dialogues, and the stupid storyline. Also the entire thing is a sad attempt of trying to be funny.

Definitely had a good laugh, if you are open minded the movie is actually funny. Octavia seemed to stiff for me in this movie though, thankfully McCarthy doesn't take herself to serious so the balance between the two were great.
