This film won't win any awards for anything but it got a few chuckles out of us and who doesn't want to see Jason Bateman as a half-crab criminal with a conscience?!If you've run out of things to watch on Netflix and can manage your expectations for a silly comedy that doesn't require any brain power, give it a go.
Pointless film, pointless waste of time. What shoud that ?

The story was bizarre, which doesn't help to get a comedy movie off the ground. "Spy" was so much better for McCarthy. This one just reached too far for humour and seemed to fail at every hurdle. I didn't even watch the end of it. The script was bad and you just got the feeling like the actors were struggling with the whole idea of it.

reviews.review_title: For this movie to be bad it needs to improve!
reviews.content: You're better of watching anything else.... It's just ridiculous! C'mon Netflix you're better than this!
It's exactly what you'd expect a predictable story in which everything ends with the hero winning.

I was so amazed at how badly reviewed this movie was and i ended up deciding not to watch it. The fact that we as movie lovers finally can agree this much on trashy comedy which happens very very Very rarely. Only means its not worth it. I read many reviews and i wanted to spare whom is doing the same and write this as a review. Even though I didn't see the film. I don't regret that, you wont either.
Melissa mcarthy is clearly much better suited to rated r movies stupid childish humour that should have a pg rating.

Love every film she's in. No matter what she's on she makes me laugh lots!Brilliant actress! Every film we watch we know we'll have a good time and laugh. She NEVER disappoints! My 6 year old found this hilarious!Bring on Thunder Force 2!!
Watching cat gifs is more productive than sitting this one.... McCarthy has managed to flop a superhero movie in the rise of superhero movies.
Awful writing, flat acting. Absolute trash. I watched an hour or so of this waste of time and gave up. Unwatchable. I liked the cast, I just wish they were given something better to work with.

This is one of the weirder movies I've watched in a while and though it does have quite a few cheap gags in there they still made me laugh how they pulled it off. It also seemed quite short for modern film but it gets straight to the point and tells the story rather than having a long drawn out origin story like most superhero movies. It doesn't really have much of a build up either. Which isn't bad, just different. It's definitely worth a watch if you enjoy Melissa Mccarthy films and will be enjoyable but not as good as some of her other work.Also Jason Bateman as crab man is just fantastic.

reviews.review_title: Octavia and Melissa just rocked it.
reviews.content: I would give it an 11, if I could. It's an amazing movie. Loved and adored my favourite actress working as a Force, The Thunder Force. It doesn't deserve a 4 on 10 here, it deserves much more and many more "woke" viewers to go into the depths of what this fantastic the cast and crew are offering. I will definitely show this movie to my students when I have to talk about power and feminism. Love it more than I can express.
If you need to get away from all the "seriousness" going on in the world and just have a good laugh, this is the movie for you. Loved the diversity, "girl power", and 80s music, as well.

I loved this movie. It was just fun from beginning to end, and probably a more realistic take on how superheroes would manage in the real world. It's funny and entertaining and warm hearted and if you can handle the love life of a slightly sociopathic man crab, you will enjoy it.

reviews.review_title: It's meant to be dumb, calm down.
reviews.content: I'm not sure what all the negative reviewers here were expecting. It's not a Marvel movie and is obviously supposed to be silly. Seeing two middle aged female BFFs (in real life and in the movie) who exist outside the ideal Hollywood beauty standards, have fun making a dumb superhero movie is just silly fun. The leads have good chemistry and there are some good laughs in there. This movie is exactly the kind of thing male comedic actors have been getting made for years. I guess some people just can't handle it when it's older women who aren't meant to be eye-candy.

reviews.review_title: If the site let me give it zero stars i would've
reviews.content: They drag every joke out until there is know way they could keep talking about that subject, they over use terrible one liners. I don't recommend this movie. The best part was the fact that it ended.

First off, I'm not sure why most reviews has been so negative. Personally, I laughed throughout this movie from beginning to end. I love the sarcasm and execution. For a Netflix movie, it was fantastic. I've been recommending this movie to everyone I know.

reviews.review_title: I have never given 3 before, but this movie deserves it
reviews.content: I feel like this movie is written by a 5 year-old. The directing, the music, all feels so forced. The acting is very mediocre. Nothing goes together. The director must woken up one morning and thought to himself "oh, I think this movie needs a bit of this", and without any further thinking, he adds directly to it. This movie is like the first draft of your uni essay, near rubbish. That's almost 2 hours of my life I am never getting back.

reviews.review_title: It was funny at times, but they should keep the politics out of it.
reviews.content: They seemed to try to push Woke ideology at times, and it just didn't seem to fit in with the story. They also had the good person running for mayor as a progressive and the antagonist uses the words "big beautiful" to describe something (a shot at Trump and Republicans). Can't we just have a funny movie without politics? Is that too much to ask? It was hilarious at times, and Melissa McCarthy has been one of my favorite actresses for a while.

reviews.review_title: Superhero movie, but make it about fat jokes.
reviews.content: Going into this movie, I was prepared to love it, for a few reasons. I love Octavia Spencer and Melissa McCarthy; I think they are both incredibly talented women, for that alone, I went in with high expectations and the other reason is that the movie has two plus-size leads and as a plus person myself, I am all for that representation, especially in a superhero movie as this is almost always never the norm. The twisted thing about expectations however is that they usually lead to disappointment and this movie had bucket loads of it.When Melissa McCarthy is a lead in a movie, it would be naïve of one not to expect comedy and that is exactly what happened in this movie, her character has little to no character development, her whole arc in the movie is entirely mad up of being the comic relief like any other movie she is in. This is not Melissa's fault because for the most part, it works, I found myself giggling a few times during the movie, I think I was meant to laugh a lot more but most of the jokes fell flat, Melissa and Octavia are both plus-size women, so the better part of the movie is dedicated to fat stereotypical jokes, that compensate for a lackluster storyline.Melissa McCarthy with the help of the young girls that played a younger her(Vivian Falcone and Mia Kaplan) did a decent job bringing a typical Melissa McCarthy character, Lydia, to life. The really isn't much to dissect about her character, she plays out how you'd expect her to play out from the moment she is introduced. Melissa McCarthy might just be the most typecast actress in Hollywood, but that is a discussion for another time.The storyline was promising, a young, smart black girl, who had a bad thing happen to her as a child, growing up to be a powerful woman dedicated to fighting back against those that wronged her as a child is an inspiring story and Octavia Spencer and the young actresses that played a younger her(Bria Danielle and Tai Leshaun) did an amazing job breathing life into the character of Emily Stanton but somehow the storyline still fell flat, and this was mostly due to the fact that the movie is too self-aware, it is very aware of the diverse cast it has, the inclusivity feeling the viewer will get while watching, unfortunately it is also because of that self-awareness that they didn't take time to develop their characters, make you care about the heroes, even the villain.The Crab had more character development than both our heroes, and his whole deal is that he has crabs for arms, when the only character that is memorable from your movie is a guy whose power is having crab arms, then you know your movie did something wrong. This movie had moments where it felt like they wanted you to take a moment serious but then ruined it with a lazy dry joke in the next scene. This movie is bad as far as superhero movies go but it's a decent watch if your thing is laughing over forced stereotypical jokes.
It hurts that I can't get my IQ points back up after this😭😭😭😭
This is absolutely not funny at all. Looked like some students work, no funny jokes at all, bad camera work. No emotions except facepalm...
One of lamest movie of all time.It's very sad that they spent money and time for this movie.
It's so dumb it's good, but can we have a whole movie with Jason Bateman's crab man? Totally my favorite part.

Very funny movie, Ben Falcone did another great job, Melissa McCarthy and Jason Bateman and the entire cast did a great job doing what their supposed to do and that is to make you laugh. If you want a serious movie don't watch. With all the stupid things going on in the world today and all the PC (bs) it's good to just sit down and have a good laugh and for me I laughed the entire movie.
She was laughing every few minutes, that's a winner to me, I'd rather hear her laughing than screaming.Death Proof last night I needed ear plugs.
Slow off the mark to build the characters - but once the film gets going it is really enjoyable. Well worth a watch.

reviews.review_title: It's daft fun, what's the problem?
reviews.content: This whiled away a Sunday afternoon. It's daft fun, but it kept us entertained from start to finish, the crab jokes alone had us giggling.Great to see strong, funny female characters with no one having to make a reference to it.
It's just a feel good, good fun, goofy movie with 2 female leads rockin' it.Be happy in these difficult times :)
I couldn't even finish this horrible movie. Not recommended for little kids.
Not funny at all. I enjoyed "Spy", but this one .. uggghh.
Don't waste your time watching this, it's the worst film I've ever seen.

reviews.review_title: Go for the ride and enjoy.
reviews.content: No, it's not an Oscar contender, but it was never intended to be. You liked Spy, you enjoyed The Heat, you're going to probably enjoy this too. I really can't believe the reviews, there just seems to be a disconnect between what people viewing were expecting and what was delivered. Be in the mood for lightly offensive, super hero based stupidity, and you will enjoy the ride.

reviews.review_title: Just a generic modern comedy movie
reviews.content: As much as i enjoy representations of almost unknown, diferent, superheroes, Thunder Force sure is not a good example at all. The jokes are really annoying sometimes and they try too much to bring the idea of "women can be strong; homossexuals are okay". Of course, it is important to represent such issues, but i believe a movie should make it seem more natural, less forced, not the way they tried with this movie. Another problem i had was with the Emily actress. I'm not saying she's bad at her job, but she looks too old to be portraying a character who's in their 30s/40s. The villains were predictable and generic, especially the female one, who i don't remember the name. They tried to make the main villain, who i also don't remember the name, have a goal, a reason to be attacking the city, but still wasn't convincing. Overall, the movie was really poorly made, and even the scenes which had a big opportunity of being epic and memorable, were boring and not creative.

Y'all do too much sit down and enjoy the movie LMAO?The point of the movie was to be a comedy. There wasn't much of a plot. But why are y'all so stuck up nowadays?? The reviews on every movie now are so harsh some of yall just don't have a sense of humor oh my god. Some of them I understand but I honestly found this movie funny.

Nice , Movie Thunder Force
but Still something I don't like in This movie.
I know it's supposed to be funny, but it's really not. So not funny. Really bad acting from two great actresses, what were they thinking to sign up for this. It's just really really bad.
Zero character development, hopeless plot, no laughs. I'm guessing they made it up as they went along "Don't worry, we'll save it in the edit"... They didn't.

reviews.review_title: Average movie but not as bad as some makes it out to be
reviews.content: Average movie but not as bad as some makes it out to be. It's not supposed to be a Marvel or DC movie. It's supposed to be a movie where you don't have to really think. Those who come expecting a carefully crafted superhero movie will be disappointed because it's not that but it isn't bad either.

If you're looking for a smart or classy film, move on. If you're looking for something that is unashamedly fun, give this a go!!Melissa McCarthy is excellent, as usual, Octavia Spencer is great in such a broad comedy andJason Bateman is a stand out amongst the rest of the cast, even if just for the way he leaves a scene!!Again, give it a go, what's the worst that could happen!!

reviews.review_title: I didn't know it could be that bad
reviews.content: This movie should never have been made. I am actually shocked that Melissa McCarthy, Jason Bateman AND Octavia Spencer agreed to do this after reading the script. This was so bad that I am going to check reviews for every one of their future projects before blindly going in. This is a low of all of their careers and I saw Tammy. Skip it, skip it, skip it.

This was a total bore. Where's the humor? Where's the drive? Where's the plot?All I saw was a massive apple commercial. I have no interests in watching any commercials, let alone a 106 minutes long apple commercial with product placements everywhere.I stopped watching after 25 minutes and watched something with less apple products in it.

reviews.review_title: I can not belive this rate and the reviews here! :O
reviews.content: I will copy and paste, 51% and 4 stars is not possible. This movie is political, hot and dense. With characters that show realtime sociological perspectives, soundtrack and amazing skills shown by Ben Falcone.You guys really need to see this movie, not just watch.

reviews.review_title: Please give Melisa a decent script!
reviews.content: This was just awful, with two good actors like melissa and Octavia you would think it would be a hit.
That movie was just terrible...I prefer to see my two cats sleep than to see it again. I had year's to see a movie so so bad. Please save your time and just avoid it at any cost.
This is a good family comedy. Good entertainment for a good evening with family or friends.

reviews.review_title: To be 100% candid, I stopped watching after about an hour...
reviews.content: Nevertheless, I would easily rate this as one of the worst films I've seen in a very long time.Melissa McCarthy's brand of humor is generally not my taste, but she's undoubtedly funny, just not in this terrible super hero money grab of a snore fest.Zero chemistry between she and Octavia Spencer, who seemed confused or uncomfortable in the role.I could go on (and on) about just how bad this film was, but suffice to say this was a painfully inept, unfunny movie with obvious gags, stupid hackneyed tropes, terrible acting, a script written with 10-year-olds in mind and just a really bad film.I left my wife to finish watching this POS and I have no regrets other than leaving her to endure the pain of this complete waste of time and money.Shoutout to Jason Bateman and Bobby Cannavale who should have phoned this in as it would have been just as interesting.Enjoy this paychecks, boys, because it's not as if you earned them.Executive Summary: PU stinkaroo.
Most Melissa McCarthy movies royally suck. This one was actually watchable. If they cut out the lame jokes directed towards 6 year olds, it would have been decent.
Sorry, I love this kind of movies but this one is disappointing.

reviews.review_title: This Movie Should Have Stayed Invisible
reviews.content:
Oh, Melissa McCarthy you should have stayed on Mike and Molly. Octavia Spencer you should have read the script. After reading the script you should have thrown it away.Thunder Force, while it could have been funny about two forty something women gaining superpowers, instead turned out to be a lame un-funny Melissa McCarthy vehicle where she is her loud, obnoxious, stupid character that she has played many times before.Octavia Spencer, try as she might to hold this movie together to give it some heart, is clearly out of element here. You never see any emotion in her face. Is she upset that McCarthy's character comes back into her life. Is she happy? You can't tell. When she had scenes with daughter, you just don't care.The writing of this movie was so poor you could tell where it was going from the first five minutes. Under a different director and without McCarthy chewing up each scene she is in
the premise might have worked.But when McCarthy and hubby, Ben Falcone get together to make a film, funny is not what happens. Don't get me wrong Melissa can be very funny and can show real acting prowess if given a decent script and a director who reigns her in. Falcone, on the other hand, lets his wife run wild with her facial expressions and low brow attempts to be funny.Suprisingly the funniest lines come from Jason Bateman. If you dare to watch this movie, you will see that he has his timing down and is the one bright spot but that is not saying much.And don't get me started on the romantic fantasy scene in the liquor store. It was just weird and out of place.I am giving this movie one star because of the cool looking superhero costumes. Of course, you can see the costumes in the trailer so take my word for it - give this movie a hard pass and do something else with your time.

reviews.review_title: Impossible to watch beyond a few minutes
reviews.content: Ugly, poorly written. Netflix produces another trashy film. Don't even bother trying. It's that bad.

reviews.review_title: Was so hyped for this, but it disappointed!
reviews.content:
After watching the trailer i was super hyped for this movie! 5 minutes in i loved it, but that stopped about 15 minutes later...
I love Melissa, and the base of the story is actually pretty good, but somewhere in the middle it just falls apart. Has some good and funny scenes, but it in end it was a huge disappointment for both me and my boyfriend.

reviews.review_title: Screw everyone else who thinks it sucks
reviews.content: I think it's hilarious, especially the pieces with Jason Bateman and Melissa McCarthy. If you think this movie is boring/unfunny/stupid, those words describe you and I'm so glad I don't have to suffer through knowing you.

Anyone who rates this less than 7 is a moron. Anyone who rates it less than 5 had no sense of humour and/or no appreciation of fandom.It's a great, stupid, mindless, well written comedy. I'm not even a fan of South Park and I still got the Kenny reference.Well put together movie. The cast, acting and writing was spot on. Perfect laugh at the end of a long week.Keep it up Ms. McCarthy et al.!

reviews.review_title: Annoying even just as background noise
reviews.content: Yes, it is THAT bad.Stupid predictable story lines, extremely illogical. It's not those kind of movie which you thought it would get better after the first half. No it doesn't. It get worse. I rarely give reviews below 5 starts but this I have to give it a 1, I want to give -1 if possible.

reviews.review_title: i can't believe this is a comedy
reviews.content: The movie is more about supporting the gen-z agenda like ( people assuming other people gender and lgbtq+ stuff) not about comedy and funny scenarios.

If this movie wasn't about superheroes and didn't have Melissa McCarthy I would rate even lower. That said, the bad reviews on here are justified. I went in with low expectations to begin with and that always helps me enjoy a movie more when I take away the hype. I am ok with super hero comedies since it can parody the somewhat serious at times versions of these movies we have now. I also go in with a different mindset when it is a comedy. In spite of that, there are some ridiculously silly (stupid) scenes in this movie that are only saved a little bit by some of the what I found legitimately funny. This movie is hard to rate for me when considering other people since this movie's appeal will be highly subjective. If you are picky and serious about your movie watching this movie is likely around a 2, it you are casual and open minded to just enjoy what is presented then a 4.5. So why the 5? The extra .5 rating is because I like Melissa McCarthy, Octavia Spencer and Jason Bateman (in spite of his character being one of the stupid elements but I also get a kick out of it because I know the character was written specifically for Melissa and her husband's own amusement in having Jason wear the prosthetics in the movie, he did not know about them until filming began, lol). So ultimately watch this movie at your own risk. I'm ok with it. Got a few giggles and that's about it.

The premisse of this movie is really good. 2 meddle age women having superpowers, running out of the usual teenager drama of this kind movies, but after the firsts 5 minutes (really good firsts 5 minutes) the movie becoming a trash.

The problem with a lot of Netflix movies is that they were made before 2020, a year when pretty much everything changed, including humor. All the jokes feel very dated and the bits go on too long. I also didn't understand half the references and I'm 32, so I'm not sure who the intended audience is.
The kind of movie you feel embarrassed watching because it's just so bad.

A fun movie (especially if you enjoy Melissa McCarthy) ... It had a lot of good moments in it. It was what I expected and I was not disappointed. I don't watch a lot of 'new' movies but this was easy to watch and no regrets spending a little less than two hours of my life on it :)
Very irresponsible as a storyline. Don't eat raw chicken, its dangerous.Anyway film was very unfunny, a shame because it had potential.

I couldn't finish the movie. Had a cute plot but when there is a clear agenda to push being lesbian, particularly in the dinner scene with the grandmother, I did not continue. Beware to families who do not want their children exposed to this agenda.
Absolutely horrible... no story line, cheesy, boring, and very strange.
Wow, wanted to like this movie but it was so bad. Started watching it and just wanted it to end. Only liked Jason as the crab! I would avoid unless you really have nothing else to watch.

Please remember this is a comedy before an action movie. Takes on a different view of superhero movies. From the customers they have to wear to car they have to drive. Love the character designs and cast, Melissa is so funny throughout the movie. If you like The Heat, you'll enjoy this one as well.

I've never written a review and just couldn't help myself. I've watched over 5,000 movies and this was just a blast. I will do myself a favor and stop relying on reviews and give myself a chance and enjoy myself! Mo regrets.
I really enjoyed this film and so did my son.Light comedy not taking itself too seriously.Throughly enjoyed it. :)

Melissa McCarthy is not funny. I don't know why keep selecting her to do these kind of movies. This movies is borign, it has some good actors trying to save the film but no, it has a bad script. Don't waist your time in this movie. Not even the special effects are good or entertaining.
Solid movie. Good message. Funny. Lots of action. Jason Bateman had me in tears every time he crab walked.

It's a nice adventure movie, we could count on some moment comedy in t. I was interested in seing other heroes than the usual stereotypes of muscular and model built bodies. Having two middle aged women was really nice. We could be heroes at any age and shape right?I think it could have been more silly and funny, secondary characters didn't really have a lot of the power. So.. It's a nice movie to watch if you want to kill time after a long day of work.

It's sad that they couldn't make this a good movie. The concept for the movie is ok. I truly tried to give it a chance, but the movie actively worked against me trying to like it.So no!! Do not watch!
I just can't believe how bad this was,. I think I kind of laughed once in the first 30 minutes, after that I felt stupid for watching it. So ya, don't waste your time.
Very hard watch, great group of talent but story is so thin.Tough to watch out of shape super hero's even try make a difference.. sad.

reviews.review_title: Could have been so much better had anyone proof watched it
reviews.content: Melissa McCarthy hasn't been in a funny films for a while now so not sure why this is tagged as a comedy.
Great film to watch with 8-12 year old kids. Cheesy corny humour, action and comedy. The kids loved it. It's never going to compete with the big action flicks, but as a family flick it was ok.
It's really not bad. I watched it with my 10 year old and he loved it. It's not serious it's silly and I love Jason Bateman in everything he does. He made the movie.

One review is not enough
This should be given the award of the worst movie in history.

reviews.review_title: Just watch and enjoy. It's hilarious.
reviews.content: This movie is hilarious. I never listen to reviews. When most hate a film, I know I am gonna love it. McCarthy has some great lines and some very funny moments.

This is the worst twenty minutes of movie watching I have ever experienced. Watching for those twenty minutes I will never get back makes me feel ashamed.I knew it was not it was not going to be Gone With The Wind, but whoever paid for this production should be even more ashamed. Does someone have embarrassing pictures of someone? That is the only way I can explain it.Please, do not waste your time.

reviews.review_title: 5 stars but only with good intentions
reviews.content: The film was okay. Maybe.First of all there was some funny lines in the movies, but he had nothing to say. I feel too frivolous for a superhero movie. This is not the category.The cast was good, they are also very good in general.Above all, there were parts where I laughed out loud and there were parts where I just grabbed my head about what this wanted to be now.

This is only my second review mind. A film from the stable of Melissa McCarthy is bound to be full of pure fun, but, NOT THIS ONE. This was terrible, well, it would be brilliant if you were only 7 years old staying with grandpa and grandma for the weekend, but this was utterly atrocious. SORRY, thats it in a nutshell. Just knew it in the first 5 minutes.

Watched this despite the low rating coz I love Melissa Mccarthy.. Was pleasantly surprised. It was full of zany comedy with my laugh out loud moments. Would recommend it to anyone who just wants a bit of fun and doesn't take life too seriously.
I laughed so hard. The Crab is a great bad guy. I loved seeing Octavia Spencer in a comedy.
McCarthy/Falcone must have some serious dirt on Jason Bateman and Octavia Spencer to get them to appear in this movie.Just no.

There was nothing good about this film. The script was preposterously juvenile even for a juvenile. McCarthy and Spencer should not have been best friends, not because they were complete opposites, that often works in a film, but because they didn't connect with each other on even the most superficial ways.The opening scenes make you want to look a bit further, because of the interaction between the younger characters of McCarthy and Spencer. But as soon as they aged into their adult bodies - it was over. No chemistry , no sympathy, no warmth, no intellect - a void. They would have been better off never meeting in real life.The idea that you create a superhero in a lab, but can only use it once and then accidentally activate it by flipping a switch? Well, maybe in a 1950's cartoon, but this is 2021, we have Thor, X-Men, and Deadpool and now Thunder Force dressed like a stuffed SWAT team of walruses who interact with a crab man?Falcone needs to find a new occupation, because after this disaster, no one with more than a IQ of 6 will fund another of his movies. He should try
DoorDash.

reviews.review_title: The same as all of the movies before
reviews.content: The character of Melissa is seen in to many movies before, nothing new. First 12 minutes you're hoping, but unfortunately. And the story, makes no sense. An end that is predictable. Waste of time.

This is one of Melissa's worst movies maybe number one on the list. I absolutely love her - she is truly one of my favorite comedians, But I was in pain the whole time trying to watch the movie because it never got funny even once. What the heck is a "miscreant"? Who thought that crap up and then tried to make a movie around it? I cringed until I couldn't stand it anymore and then wrote this review asap to warn others.

reviews.review_title: Laugh out loud funny!! Ignore the haters...
reviews.content:
What's up with the harsh reviews?? Not all superhero movies have to be Marvel movies folks. This movie is refreshingly LGBTQ+ inclusive and the female characters are in positions of power (and have powers). So if that's a turn off for you, just skip it. There's no damsel in distress or running in ridiculously high high heels anywhere. It's just plain fun, with some goofy sprinkled in. I laughed out loud throughout the movie. Even the person I watched it with, who isn't a big Melissa McCarthy fan, did as well. The story is about what happens when two friends, who are opposites in every way, get superpowers & all the adjustments and awkwardness that come with it as they try to do good and fight the bad doers.***SPOILERS!***
Those who didn't find this movie funny, might not have gotten a lot of the references. Lots of 80's/90's references, which if you're in your 40's are hilarious. There's even a training montage. And watch for Jason Bateman's character escaping by walking sideways (or "crab walking") in the end fight scene. Sit back & have a good laugh with this one. No need for Marvel level analysis.

reviews.review_title: Remove the stick from your orifice
reviews.content: No, it's not filet mignon, but it is a double double. Funniest comedy i've seen in a few years...not just since chinavirus. So remove the stick from your orifice, slam a few drinks, put on your boner pants and have a laugh. Stay classy Merica.

Surprisingly funny. Go in with low expectations and a glass of wine and you'll probably enjoy it. It was a lot funnier than I thought it would be. The actual plot is ok, but that's not the point. Melissa mccarthy is very funny and charming in this film. Happy I watched it.
Looks like the potential to give cancer, wouldn't recommend to watch.

Literally, I waste my 1.47 hr of my life, they want to show this movie funnier or family friendly but this movie literally 💩 don't waste your time to watch this movie. I'm the person who come to rate or feedback about this movie.
Poor storyline and storytelling.Really hard to finish watching this movie.Spend the budget on something better.

reviews.review_title: Fun movie to not take too seriously
reviews.content: Just what I thought it would be: a fun movie that can't be taken too seriously. And I don't think the actors took it that serious too. They were having fun and some acting bits were amazing (who can act without bursting into laughter when singing to Seal in a super suit?!). Don't expect a great comedy with a perfect story, but just go with it and enjoy!
I don't know about anyone else, but I personally thought it was a great movie. I dont why it only had 3.9 stars. Malisa McCarthy & Octavia are both beautiful and funny women.

This is the poorest script I ever watched! Gross, stupid, lacks imagination, odd enough you can predict the sleazy plot! It's every wrong movie tinted with the avengers poorly. Melissa's husband must hate her to put her into this! I wanted to see her as a super hero! You can do better Melissa! As much as you want to make money, make art/cinema!!!

It was spectacular! I loved Octavia and Melissa together. They made a great team! Yes it was campy. Yes, Jason added to the mix, which was unexpected. But an incredibly fun movie to watch on an evening when you REALLY don't want something too heavy to weigh on your mind. Critics and others may give it a low rating, but sometimes you need something lighter and funny like this to take you away from life's troubles. Truly enjoyed this movie to the end. Can't beat that with some of the heavy handed things that they are putting out these days. I absolutely LOVED it and will probably watch it again multiple times.

Yes, it's not a masterpiece - but i think this is one of those movies I would have LOVED as a kid. It has heart, is about friendship and is fun. I remember stuff like Jumanji or Flubber having a hard time with the critics back in the 90s - or even Space Jam. But for me they were incredibly important and i really believe that THUNDER FORCE might be a movie that kids from today totally love - i see this becoming their nice memory to go back to in 10, 20 years from now. Again, it's not a masterpiece at all but I had a good time and my nephew and niece fell in love with it.
Please go do sth useful than wasting your time on this.

I almost didn't watch because of the reviews but people are honestly just being dramatic. Obviously if you don't find Melissa McCarthy funny, you wouldn't find this movie funny so why are you watching in the first place? It actually was a cute little story and I definitely laughed out loud more than once. And of course, Jason Bateman was hilarious as usual.
I believe that is not worth it.The movie is another one created by Netflix with a very good trailer and with telling you nothing.Dont choose this movie to kill your time.

reviews.review_title: It was actually kind of fun...
reviews.content: This movie wasn't meant to be a masterpiece; it was meant to be a feel-good comedy. I understand the negative reviews because it is not for everyone, but I rather enjoyed the silliness of it all. It is a good movie to put on for a giggle with a friend.

I read these "reviews" on here and always sense a follow the leader pattern, one person gives it a bad review and then the page is bombarded with negative reviews, I didn't realise everybody got a job with total film or empire during the pandemic and became a film critic.I've laughed more at other films starring Melissa Mccarthy but I still chuckled at this one, it's light-hearted and enjoyable, it won't win any Oscars but so what, many films don't.If you had the chance to put your wife in as many films as you could, wouldn't you? Ask Tim Burton.

It was torture Melissa tries to hard to be funny
It too long for the movie to get to the point.

It's a really good movie, it has good laughs.If you left a low review complaining about how this movie got green lit you're in your feelings about it. If you don't like her don't watch it simple.The rating this has is a majority of people dissing on her and her career. Not an actually movie rating.And to the person that said their family was on their phones half way through movie, your family has phone addition issue...

reviews.review_title: Oh, I think it's worth the time.
reviews.content: This is ridiculously funny. Yes it's awful. Enjoy it as that. Have a little fun kids. Pg13. Yep.

They're trying so hard to force this to be funny. Like relying on Melissa McCarthy to carry a movie using the same comedy from every other movie she's in. It's such a stale attempt. It's like Jack Black's character in Tropic Thunder let his movie family try to write an entire superhero underdog movie. An absolute whiff that I doubt I could get through if I was held at gunpoint.

I actually got so disgusted I fast forwarded through several parts of it. Love the movie spy and she can and is funny especially in bridesmaids. BUT... the knock off sex scene from Bridesmaids with food fell more than flat. The entire movie was a snore fest! Don't waste your time this was an epic fail. :(

reviews.review_title: You've missed it if you don't find the genius in the banter
reviews.content: LOVE YOU ALL! We're still laughing. A ton of new references to add to our bag. Cheers to Mr. Falcone!
Do not waste your time. No laughs no thrills no excitement.

reviews.review_title: Please don't waist your time.... not one smile.....
reviews.content:
How do you go from The Spy and Bridesmaids to this????It is very sad to see that there are non great comedies....
I hope actors will start looking for great projects one day soon vs taking anything that comes along....
DO NOT WATCH it and Don't Trust that is It
# 1 anything anywhere!!!!

Stop forcing genders on Movies... You will keep losing money and fans if you keep doing this.I had high expectations for this movie, as soon as you started forcing the genders, we all stoped watching the movie.Melissa McCarthy has to stop doing these kind of movies, she is waay to talented to be accepting these movies that make no sense at all and seem like some of the minority wrote the story.Stop forcing genders on Movies... You will keep losing money and fans if you keep doing this.I had high expectations for this movie, as soon as you started forcing the genders, we all stoped watching the movie.Melissa McCarthy has to stop doing these kind of movies, she is waay to talented to be accepting these movies that make no sense at all and seem like some of the minority wrote the story.
I hope Jason Bateman got paid royally for this. I rather watch money burn.

I LOVE Melissa McCarthy, Octavia Spencer and Jason Bateman. Having said that, even their great acting couldn't save this movie.Some of the pros were: the ladies' friendship, the strong female characters, and the positive parenting. The two women would very unlikely be friends, but they stuck together when they were little and then reunited later on. I appreciated the fact that Melissa's character prayed before family meals, but the prayers were a little disrespectful. Octavia's daughter was encouraged to be smart as was her mother even though people called them a nerd.I really disliked the political innuendo. The 'progressive' candidate-who was an AOC Lookalike- defeated the Evil Incumbent. Progressives are good and there were positive statements about the Obamas too.Also, there were many references to same-sex relationships. Why put that in? We don't need to know someone's sexual preference. It's clearly on their agenda.And finally, like I stated in the opening paragraph- it just wasn't good. The actors are good but, when your bad guy 'crab-armed' man is dipping the super hero in her day dreams... well that pretty much tells you it's a silly movie without a lot of interesting content.

reviews.review_title: Dude.... y'all need to chill it's supposed to be ridiculous
reviews.content: I'm writing my first review only because y'all are haters. I laughed out loud constantly because it's ridiculous and supposed to be. McCarthy and Bateman are playing their prime characters. I do wish Spencer leaned in a bit more but she's a goddess regardless. Anyways calm down you guys, just stop taking things so seriously.
People need to lighten up, this movie is hilarious and fun. Bateman steals the show as always.
Almost let the reviews away me. Made me laugh out loud. Just sprinkle some Old Bay around and lighten up. When the crab walked sideways in the convenience store....omg 🤣

Started off with low expectations due to poor ratings-actually food it enjoyable and fun. It helped to watch it with kids. Good message and some LOL moments made it worth it to watch it on a rainy afternoon.

reviews.review_title: I don't understand the hate this movie is getting...
reviews.content: The movie is fine. Is it going to win an Oscar? Was it the funniest movie ever? No and no. But did it look cheap, was it the worst movie of 2021 so far and totally unfunny? No to all of those too! It was a regular funny comedy. I enjoyed watching it.

reviews.review_title: Laughed Out Loud - McCarthy & Spencer were Awesome
reviews.content: I was really surprised at all of the negative reviews. I loved this movie - it had my attention all throughout. There are some moments with crude humor but I think that's to be expected in a McCarthy movie. It was funny in all the right moments and this was my first time seeing Spencer in something not serious.I also thought this movie was pretty inclusive without being overly politically correct. POC, LGBT, and body positive representation is always a plus.Anyway definitely give this movie a watch!
It looks like the low cost movie. Some stupid actions just for the story. Not funny at all.Why Netflix decided to produce it?

Whilst this wasn't quite as good as some other Melissa McCarthy movies, it was still a funny & enjoyable, light hearted spoof comedy! Definitely not to be taken seriously whatsoever like some people clearly have.

OK so it's not a great film but it's hardly the worst! It's just a film to watch so you can shut of and forget the world for a bit.I mean Jason Bateman crab walking out of his scenes was amazing!Would I watch it again, No! Was it a bit of mindless fun, Yes!Just shut your brains off and have a giggle.Not every film has to be dark, gritty and thought provoking.
If you like Ozarks you'll love this... Jason Bateman basically plays the same character.
With everything going on in the world today and the lack of new movies, I thoroughly enjoyed this one. It made me laugh and I needed a laugh so it was worth MY time.

I'm not sure why everyone is hating on this movie so much. It's a fine movie for what it is. It has a basic plot of the superhero team up, but it does it well. The acting is good all around, nothing special, but nothing awful. Sometimes movies can just exist to be mindless entertainment, and as far as that goes, this movie does that fairly well.
Is this winning an Oscar? No, but will you laugh? Yes. I thought it was funny when it needed to be and I took it for what it was worth, a campy, have a chuckle comedy.

I laughed out loud several times, especially around Bateman's scenes. His crab character was hilarious. As usual McCarthy didn't disappoint. The dancing scene with Bateman should be included in historical comedy reels from now on.I can understand some of the bad reviews but i believe the mistakes were in casting. The Emily and the King characters could have been elevated by funnier actors. The Emily character was too serious/scared throughout the movie, even after she had her powers. The King character could've been a comedy gold mine in the hands of Ferrell or anyone like him. All in all I enjoyed the movie, laughed, didn't feel like I wasted my time as some have reviewed. However, I immediately notice/wish they had casted other people in those two parts. I noticed that I looked forward to seeing Bateman and Mccarthy interact together again. They were the best part of the movie, well along with McCarthy kicking ass.

reviews.review_title: Honestly! Don't let other deter you.
reviews.content: This movie is, I think exactly what you would think from it. It's meant to be a fun movie made for everyone. It's been a hard enough year and this was just a nice pick me up! Allowed us to have such a fun night after being stuck in the house for over a year. It's amazing to see such a fun NEW movie at home after not being able to go to the theaters!All the performances were entertaining and gave us a good chuckle. (:
Like Thunder!I love Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer! While the story line is predictable, I appreciated the witty dialogue and general girl power awesomeness. So did my 12 yo daughter.
"Thunder Force": since the good cast involved, I was hoping, at least, to have a few laughs. No. It's just really bad in everything. Don't waste your time.

Saw a clip and thought it might be fun. Little did I know that the clip was the only funny bit of the whole film (apart from 1 other joke). Liked the daughter but everything else was just horrible. Please, please don't make Thunder Force 2.
Predictably predictable. Colossal waste of time. Very disappointed in this movie.

It was pleasing to hear that Octavia Spencer was being cast in this movie, but I wasn't amused by her whimsical personality and terrible jokes. Her foolish parter( portrayed by Melisa McCarthy), well she was pondering about nonsense throughout the movie and her acting skills were most disappointing. Netflix has devoted its time and effort into producing and directing this film and could have been listening to this podcast.

reviews.review_title: Made an account just to rate it!
reviews.content: No storyline, nothing was funny at all! I'm giving them a 1 just for the casting.

I am a fan of all the actor and actresses in this movie but Spencer seemed timid and emotionless throughout the whole movie. Melissa and Jason salvaged the bad storyline and overall disappointing movie.
It may not be the funniest movie, but it was very creative with normal actors who did a great job. It shows how people can do whatever they dream or have passion for.
As always McCarthy is hilarious. Lots of laughs even during the gross parts. Bateman is just usual scene stealing self.

Great buddy flick, McCarthy killed it with the comedy. Spencer brought the class and intelligence- I enjoyed watching this movie greatly. I rarely laugh during comedies- but this had me crying! I was really impressed with the crab man too- epic love story.If you're in the mood for a hilarious film with great production value- this film is great for the whole family. Even better if ya love Chicago!!

reviews.review_title: Nice diversion as we all wait for "normal" to return
reviews.content: Melissa McCarthy is funny and a bit poignant and gives her best. Is this movie great, or inspiring or any of the things that would cause critics to turn from their condescension? No. Is it something that can elicit a laugh and diversion from this wretched pandemic? Absolutely. It's a story that feels familiar and comfortable with Melissa's unique brand of funny. She plays off Octavia Spencer's straight character so well and even manages to elicit a few "feels" along the way. I enjoyed this -- especially being "of a certain age" myself.

The story is remarkably simple and filled with cliches everywhere. They do try to create a whole new sort of universe where people got "superpowers", but the beginning when they explain how it started is where the universe begins and ends. It is boring, predictable, and just an all out "cringe-fest" to watch. It had some clever jokes, but I could count them all on one hand.It is a movie build up on cliches, a boring plot and midcore actors (except Octavia Spencer, and some side actors). You could almost feel their uninterest through the screen as they played out their characters. I would not say I hated the movie, more so that I did not enjoy watching it and found myself picking up my phone or looking at the time as it was playing out on the screen.Overall, it is not great and could be better.
A pointless movie that was probably written by a 10 year old. The scene when they played fortnite i couldn't be bothered anymore. Just a d grade movie and a step down for a oscar winning actor.

reviews.review_title: Not a thinker but makes for a cute family movie.
reviews.content: The plot isn't new. I repeatedly said "this is so stupid" while laughing and continuing to watch. I think I only heard the S word, making it good for kids.Good light hearted family movie.
If I want to watch two fat womans complain about having super powers I would have watched Godzilla versus Kong Kong. This is time I will never get back. May God have mercy on your soul.

I personally LOVED this movie! It was made to be slapstick funny and it was all the way around. Don't believe the negative reviews as I don't think they are appreciating the humor of this movie for what it truly is. :)

reviews.review_title: For those who don't take super hero movies seriously
reviews.content: Jason Bateman stroking her face with his claw...disco dancing with a mullet...it's THE King! I thought this movie had lots of fun parody. I guess you have to dry your humor before you appreciate it.

I dont care what that it got only 2 stars they are soooo wrong! But Thunder Force is my new favorite movie! Im not even in 20 mins and had to stop it because it hurt so much from laughing!!!! I needed this. I saw the preview and thought it would be bad, was i was1 million percent wrong. Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer make an amazing team and all their other movies are also amazing! WATCH IT!This movie is the light in the darkness that i needed.
Well, we actually got something worst than covid-19... Maybe this movie is an experiment about how much bad scenes someone can put in a movie and people still watch it. And the improvisation stinks.

Yeah it's cheesy, and I guessed the major plot twists, but I laughed. And truthfully I don't tend to laugh at that many "funny" movies. Maybe it's because I got a lot of the older references, and I related to the main characters, but I did think it was funny movie, and Jason Bateman!!
Absolute garbage fire. Its not funny, The action is cringe , The story is mediocre. The lines are atrocious. Please do yourself a favor and don't go through with this headache.

reviews.review_title: Very bad, but Jason Bateman at least gives us some fun moments
reviews.content: Jason Bateman and his crab arms were so stupid and ridiculous they were hilarious. The rest of the movie was awful.
I'll admit a slow setup made the first part drag. But while much of it was predictable it was darn funny in the process. I am hoping for a sequel ... or a series.
There are funny moments but most of them are in the trailer. There's too much ad-lib which comes across as just muttering between the two characters and is just annoying.
Not a McCarthy fan, even less of Spencer. Still thought the cast was perfect. Jokes are subtle at times, but for every missed jab is a surprise plot maneuver. Not an award winner, but fun to watch.
This was just awful. Some fine actors in it for the payday I suspect. I'll watch any old rubbish usually and take something from it but this is beyond bad.

I didn't know much about the movie before watching but was very disappointed.SPOILERS-----I just don't understand how a main character that loses both their parents and then swears to avenge them by becoming a scientist and superhero destined to gain super powers but when she does eventually create the serum of superpowers she is overweight and hasn't spent a single day training to fight. Does she think she can just get the powers and fight crime without even trying?PS I have no problem with Melissa Mcarthy getting superpowers. She stumbles into this situation and hence her character makes sense.

reviews.review_title: Feminist, family version of The Tick: B class script + AAA class actors and CGI
reviews.content: They intentionally made a superhero movie with a B class script combined with an AAA class budget, actors and CG effects. The marriage feels forced, and the movie would actually work better if it had worse effects and less budget. It's like a feminist and more family friendly (less random violence and less evil villains) version of The Tick series.

I enjoyed this movie because the media and entertainment is so full of serious drama and hardship. I just can't take another show where rape and abuse and war are the themes. The reviews in IMDb appear to have finally attracted online trolls who don't have any actual arguments that back up their criticism or just straight up bashing. Wonderful. (Oh, maybe I need to clarify my sarcasm for the hyper critical) Get a book if your looking for a great plot. Or maybe look for something that isn't lowbrow since you're so above it.

The people who likes this movie are 5 year old kids, if they're above 5, I honestly feel sorry for them knowing that they might have been seeing such crap movies all the time and doesn't get great movies, even my 10 year old son who is a big superhero fan knows this is worse than B grade movies!
Nice funny action movie. With my favorite actresses.

If you grew up in the 80s and 90s and were the misunderstood in school then this is your movie!My sister and I howled at this movie because we did! It was like watching us get to kick ass on screen in all the fun and weird ways!Well done Ben! Well done cast!Sorry about Kenny. 😉
A definite fave!

I didn't really hate this movie as a lot of other seem to judging by the current rating and reviews but I was kind of hoping for a better movie judging by the actors appearing (Octavia Spencer and. Jason Bateman). Melissa McCarthy did what she always does which is try to be funny but not succeeding most of the time.Spencer didn't really have all that much to do in this movie which was sad since she could have probably added more depth to it but instead they chose to focus on McCarthy's antics.The plot was predictable and you could pretty much tell where everything was headed from the start.The premise was interesting enough but similar things have been done many times in recent years and they were done much better in most cases.Overall this is a pretty forgettable movie that you can watch while doing something else (cooking, exercising etc...) without needing to turn on your brain even a little bit, and that is exactly what I did so I might have enjoyed it more than other people did.P. S. Raw chicken?!? Are you trying to give people food poisoning? Because you know some kids are gonna try raw chicken as a dumb online trend after seeing it in this movie.
